translation.en: [narrator] BKF Productions. Fun. Freedom. Family values.
translation.zh: 布克弗格森制作公司趣味、自由、家庭观念

translation.en: The American tradition. And, as always, hunter approved.
translation.zh: 美式传统而且一如既往 经猎手认证

translation.en: Coming around the bend. Coming around broadside.
translation.zh: 过来 到开阔地上来

translation.en: Oh! [laughs]
translation.zh: （猎鹿热潮）

translation.en: One shot. One kill.
translation.zh: 一枪就命中一只鹿

translation.en: Hi. I'm Buck Ferguson.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是布克弗格森

translation.en: A long time ago, I decided to follow my dream
translation.zh: 很久以前 我决定追逐梦想

translation.en: of hunting whitetail deer all over the world.
translation.zh: 到世界各地打猎白尾鹿

translation.en: Lo and behold, my dreams have come true.
translation.zh: 看啊 我的梦想成真了

translation.en: I've seen the best. And I've killed the best.
translation.zh: 我见过最好的 也猎到过最好的

translation.en: And now I'm here to share with you the joy I've found in hunting whitetail deer.
translation.zh: 我现在在这个节目里跟你们分享打猎白尾鹿的快乐

translation.en: Out of all my years hunting, that is, without a doubt,
translation.zh: 在我多年的打猎经历里 毫无疑问

translation.en: the most magnificent creature I've ever laid eyes on.
translation.zh: 白尾鹿是我见过的最神奇的动物

translation.en: You see the points on that thing?
translation.zh: 看到鹿角上的那些角尖了吗？

translation.en: [whispering] Jumping Joseph!
translation.zh: 好大一只鹿！

translation.en: Yes! Yes! Yes!
translation.zh: 好极了！

translation.en: What...
translation.zh: 什么…

translation.en: I saw him and thought, "Might as well."
translation.zh: 我看到它就想：“一起打了也行啊”

translation.en: I've got a few notches in my belt,
translation.zh: 我的狩猎成果还是不错的

translation.en: but tonight's episode isn't just about killing whitetail deer.
translation.zh: 但今晚这集讲的不光是打猎白尾鹿

translation.en: [Buck] It's also about family.
translation.zh: 也讲到了家庭

translation.en: I suggest you gather you and yours
translation.zh: 我建议你们跟家人一起

translation.en: and sit back to enjoy this very special edition of Buck Fever.
translation.zh: 观看本集特别版的《猎鹿热潮》

translation.en: [Don] Just a little more sauce on the left.
translation.zh: 后视镜再往左边一点

translation.en: [Buck] Little more. Okay?
translation.zh: 再往左一点 行了吗？

translation.en: -[Don] Is that how you're gonna sit? -Mmm... Yeah.
translation.zh: -你要就那么坐着吗？-是的

translation.en: [Don] Then take it down a notch.
translation.zh: 那就把后视镜调低点

translation.en: Bring it down. Just a hair.
translation.zh: 调低 一点点就行了

translation.en: There. Look at those beautiful peepers.
translation.zh: 行了 看看这对漂亮的眼睛

translation.en: That was a good idea, Buck.
translation.zh: 这主意不错 布克

translation.en: You get us both in frame?
translation.zh: 我们俩都拍进去了吗？

translation.en: I can't get both of you in the frame.
translation.zh: 我没法把你们俩都拍进镜头

translation.en: I was gonna pan left and right, follow the conversation.
translation.zh: 我会跟据对话左右调整

translation.en: No. That's no good, Don.
translation.zh: 不行 那样不好 唐

translation.en: Jaden and me need to be in the same frame.
translation.zh: 我和杰登得出现在同一个镜头里

translation.en: [chuckles] I don’t know about that.
translation.zh: 那我可说不好

translation.en: Swingles has always been our bread and butter--
translation.zh: 我们一直都是左右晃着拍…

translation.en: If it's a comedy bit. But this is an emotional scene.
translation.zh: 如果是喜剧的话但这是个感人的镜头

translation.en: We gotta sell the father-son relationship right off the bat.
translation.zh: 要好好表现出其中的父子温情

translation.en: I'm up against the window. I can't get much wider.
translation.zh: 我已经靠在车窗上了没法把镜头拉得再宽了

translation.en: We gotta figure something out.
translation.zh: 我们得想想办法

translation.en: If we don't have the building blocks,
translation.zh: 要是这里拍不好

translation.en: the audience won't know to feel the emotional crescendo
translation.zh: 观众们就无法感受到

translation.en: when Jaden kills his first deer. It won't work.
translation.zh: 杰登第一次猎到鹿时的情感高潮那可不行

translation.en: Okay. Buck, it is gonna work. Okay?
translation.zh: 好吧 布克 能行的 好吗？

translation.en: I understand building dramatic tension as well.
translation.zh: 我也懂要制造戏剧张力

translation.en: I know this trip means a lot to you and Jaden.
translation.zh: 我知道这次打猎对你跟杰登来说意义非常重大

translation.en: But believe me,
translation.zh: 但相信我

translation.en: everything is gonna work the way it's supposed to.
translation.zh: 一切都会按预想的顺利进行的

translation.en: Raking shot.
translation.zh: 斜拍

translation.en: -What's that? -Raking shot.
translation.zh: -什么？-斜拍

translation.en: Camera goes left by the window. Jaden gets in.
translation.zh: 镜头向左移到车窗边 杰登走进镜头

translation.en: You can see Jaden, but only my eyes.
translation.zh: 可以看到杰登 但是通过我的视角

translation.en: Slow pan dolly over to me just as I turn to look at my son.
translation.zh: 在我转身去看我儿子时慢慢把摄影推车朝我这里推过来

translation.en: Saving the reveal of your face for the button. That is genius.
translation.zh: 等到最后才露出你的脸 够绝的

translation.en: -Try it out. -Let me see here.
translation.zh: -试试看-我试试看

translation.en: Wow, that is definitely gonna work.
translation.zh: 那样肯定行

translation.en: -It is, isn't it? -Yes.
translation.zh: -肯定行 不是吗？-是的

translation.en: You know, Don, this will be the greatest video we've ever made.
translation.zh: 唐 这会是我们拍的最棒的视频

translation.en: -No, Don, stay in the car. -Copy that.
translation.zh: -不 唐 别下车-好的

translation.en: Hey, Buck. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 嘿 布克

translation.en: Looks like somebody's ready to go hunting.
translation.zh: 看来有人已经为打猎做好准备了

translation.en: -Greg? What are you doing here? -Get your butt out of the cold.
translation.zh: -格雷格？你怎么在这儿？-快进来吧

translation.en: Jaden's upstairs, getting ready.
translation.zh: 杰登在楼上准备着呢

translation.en: I'll, uh... Whoo! Sure is nippy out there.
translation.zh: 我会…外面真冷

translation.en: I'll get him. Make yourself at home.
translation.zh: 我去叫他 别拘束 就像在家一样

translation.en: "Make myself at home." [scoffs]
translation.zh: “就像在家一样”

translation.en: -Oh, hey, Buck. -Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿 布克-嘿

translation.en: I'm making breakfast. Do you want anything to eat?
translation.zh: 我正在做早餐 你要吃点什么吗？

translation.en: Oh, no, thanks, Linda. I stopped at McDonald's on the way.
translation.zh: 不用了 谢谢 琳达我来的时候在麦当劳吃过了

translation.en: Oh, don't tell Jaden. He'll be mad you didn't bring him a McGriddle.
translation.zh: 别让杰登知道 你没给他带松饼汉堡他会生气的

translation.en: [Greg] You making bacon?
translation.zh: 在做培根吗？

translation.en: Man fuel. That's what I've been waiting for.
translation.zh: 补充人体能量 我就等这个呢

translation.en: Mmm! Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 真是太谢谢你了

translation.en: I need to talk to you about Jaden.
translation.zh: 我要跟你谈谈杰登的事

translation.en: What? What is it?
translation.zh: 什么事？怎么了？

translation.en: He's been acting out a lot.
translation.zh: 他最近表现很差

translation.en: If I so much as ask him about school, he gets upset and plays his video game
translation.zh: 要是我多问他几句学校的事他就会发火 去打游戏

translation.en: and he won't say a word to me all night.
translation.zh: 而且一晚上都不跟我讲话

translation.en: Getting held back last year really messed with his head.
translation.zh: 去年留级的事真的让他接受不了

translation.en: [Greg] It's the teachers' fault.
translation.zh: 那是老师的错

translation.en: I mean, everybody knows that Jaden's not good with tests.
translation.zh: 我是说 杰登不擅长考试这众所周知

translation.en: He's a visual learner, like me.
translation.zh: 他是个视觉型学习者 跟我一样

translation.en: He's not a visual learner, Greg. He's a regular learner.
translation.zh: 他不是视觉型学习者 格雷格他是个普通型学习者

translation.en: I didn't mean it that way. He's attracted to things like movies--
translation.zh: 我不是那个意思他喜欢电影之类的东西…

translation.en: He's a regular learner. Leave it alone.
translation.zh: 他是个普通型学习者 别说了

translation.en: -Hi, Dad. -Speak of the devil. How you doing, son?
translation.zh: -嗨 老爸-刚说到你呢 你好吗 儿子？

translation.en: Fine.
translation.zh: 还行

translation.en: Ready to kill your first whitetail deer?
translation.zh: 准备好第一次去猎鹿了吗？

translation.en: I'm ready to shoot something.
translation.zh: 我准备好开枪打东西了

translation.en: You bringing that guitar?
translation.zh: 你要带着那把吉他吗？

translation.en: -No, I'm carrying it for my health. -[Linda] Jaden.
translation.zh: -不 我带着它是出于健康考虑-杰登

translation.en: Say goodbye to your mom and Greg.
translation.zh: 跟你妈和格雷格说再见

translation.en: Just hang on real quick, fellas.
translation.zh: 稍等一下

translation.en: I wanted to get Jaden something for his first hunting video.
translation.zh: 这是杰登第一次拍打猎视频我想送他点东西

translation.en: -[Jaden] What is it? -Go on. Open it.
translation.zh: -是什么？-来啊 打开看看

translation.en: -No way! -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 不是吧！

translation.en: Well, that's a nice gun, but not the kind you want to take hunting.
translation.zh: 这把枪挺漂亮的 但不是打猎用的

translation.en: Why not, Buck?
translation.zh: 怎么会 布克？

translation.en: It's overkill. Too much showboating.
translation.zh: 这枪火力太强 用来显摆还行

translation.en: This is awesome. Banana clip. Laser sight. Matte black. Murdered out.
translation.zh: 太棒了 弯形弹夹、激光瞄准镜全枪身哑光黑

translation.en: Does it got a silencer? Nope.
translation.zh: 有消音器吗？没有

translation.en: This thing's a certified beast. Thanks, Greg.
translation.zh: 枪中极品啊 谢了 格雷格

translation.en: [Greg] You got it, buddy.
translation.zh: 别客气 老兄

translation.en: -[sighs] You remember Don, don't you? -Oh, yeah, I think so.
translation.zh: -记得唐吗？-记得

translation.en: How's it going? It's been a while, huh?
translation.zh: 你好吗？好久不见

translation.en: You doing something different with your hair? A faux-hawk?
translation.zh: 你换发型了？是仿莫霍克发型吗？

translation.en: It used to be a fade, but now it’s a spike.
translation.zh: 以前的很普通 现在让头发立起来了

translation.en: My hair's different, too.
translation.zh: 我的头发也不一样了

translation.en: I used to do a buzz. I'm letting it grow out.
translation.zh: 我以前刮光头 现在我留头发了

translation.en: The soft curls make my eyes pop. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 柔软的卷发能突出我的眼睛

translation.en: -Don, you ready to work now? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -唐 你可以开始拍了吗？-可以了

translation.en: We're ready. We're rolling.
translation.zh: 我们准备好了 在拍呢

translation.en: Hey, Jaden. Look what I got for you.
translation.zh: 嘿 杰登 看看我给你带了什么

translation.en: Oh, Sausage McGriddle! You know what I like.
translation.zh: 香肠松饼汉堡！你真了解我

translation.en: Nailed it. Perfect.
translation.zh: 拍得很棒 完美

translation.en: -Let's go, boys. -[engine starts]
translation.zh: 我们出发 男人们

translation.en: [Don] It's beautiful country out here, Buck.
translation.zh: 这儿的风景真美 布克

translation.en: [Buck] It's been so long since I've been up here.
translation.zh: 我上次来已经是很久以前的事了

translation.en: These are the same mountains where I killed my first deer.
translation.zh: 这里的山还跟我第一次猎到鹿时一样

translation.en: I can't believe this day is here.
translation.zh: 真没想到我今天还会再到这儿来

translation.en: I hate it when places don't have Wi-Fi. That's my Achilles' heel.
translation.zh: 我讨厌没有无线网的地方这就是我的阿喀琉斯之踵

translation.en: Wireless access will be the least of your worries
translation.zh: 你第一次出来猎白尾鹿

translation.en: when you're on your first whitetail deer hunt.
translation.zh: 该惦记的事不是有没有无线网

translation.en: -Goddamn right. -Whoo! That's what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: -说得太对了-我就是这个意思

translation.en: Colorful language. That's why we leave the women home.
translation.zh: 小子 所以我们才不带女人们一起来

translation.en: [laughs] The only women coming on this trip...
translation.zh: 这次一起来的唯一一个女人…

translation.en: Rosy Palmer and her five sisters. Look out!
translation.zh: 就只有手了 当心！

translation.en: -Whacking off! -All right, Don.
translation.zh: -打飞机！-行了 唐

translation.en: Tuggin' on your tallywhacker.
translation.zh: 撸管儿

translation.en: -[Buck] That's enough. -Pulling out our wieners and jacking off.
translation.zh: -够了-掏出你的家伙撸吧

translation.en: -Hey! Hey! -The whack-off weekend with--
translation.zh: -嘿！-打飞机周末 跟…

translation.en: We talked about that sexual stuff. Stop it.
translation.zh: 我们说过不跟孩子讲性方面的事不许说了

translation.en: [Don] Come on, Buck! You want some?
translation.zh: 来啊 布克！要比比吗？

translation.en: -Smoke him, Dad! -You bet I will!
translation.zh: -超过他 老爸！-那还用说！

translation.en: [Don] Come on!
translation.zh: 来啊！

translation.en: [Don] Come on, Buck!
translation.zh: 干得好 布克！

translation.en: [Buck] While we're waiting for the deer, start popping off some of that B-roll.
translation.zh: 在等鹿出现的时候拍些用来补充或是剪辑用的镜头

translation.en: [Don] Copy that.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: And remember, Don.
translation.zh: 还有记住 唐

translation.en: Fly on the wall with the camera. Me and Jaden are here to bond.
translation.zh: 你在拍的时候尽量别引起我们的注意我和杰登是来增进父子感情的

translation.en: That can't happen if you...
translation.zh: 那是不可能的 如果你…

translation.en: I'll buzz off. Got it.
translation.zh: 我这就走 明白

translation.en: All right. Great. Where's Jaden?
translation.zh: 好的 太好了 杰登呢？

translation.en: He's down there on the phone, yip-yapping.
translation.zh: 他正在那边打电话呢

translation.en: [Buck] Hey! Jaden!
translation.zh: 嘿！杰登！

translation.en: [Jaden] That's the stupidest excuse I've ever heard.
translation.zh: 这是我听过的最愚蠢的借口了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -Come on. You can call 'em back. -Gotta go. Bye.
translation.zh: -快来 电话可以回头再打-我要挂了 再见

translation.en: [Buck] Who were you talking to?
translation.zh: 你在跟谁打电话呢？

translation.en: My girlfriend.
translation.zh: 我女朋友

translation.en: And she's mad at me now, by the way.
translation.zh: 顺便说一下 她生气了

translation.en: -Thanks. -Why?
translation.zh: -谢谢-为什么？

translation.en: Because I had to get off the phone, and she can't talk later.
translation.zh: 因为我得挂电话可她之后不能通电话了

translation.en: Don't worry about that right now. Come on.
translation.zh: 现在别去管这个 来吧

translation.en: Hey, Don. Roll camera.
translation.zh: 嘿 唐 开始拍吧

translation.en: Hold up.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: All right. Good.
translation.zh: 行了 可以了

translation.en: All right. Fly on the wall. I'm not here. Go.
translation.zh: 好的 就当我不在 开拍

translation.en: Why don't you have a seat next to me?
translation.zh: 不如你坐到我旁边来？

translation.en: I wanna give you something.
translation.zh: 我要给你一样东西

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 是什么？

translation.en: Open it, son.
translation.zh: 打开看看 儿子

translation.en: An old gun.
translation.zh: 一把旧枪

translation.en: Not just any old gun.
translation.zh: 不是一般的旧枪

translation.en: It's a Winchester .30-30.
translation.zh: 是一把温彻斯特 点30-30

translation.en: That rifle belonged to your grandfather.
translation.zh: 这把枪以前是你爷爷的

translation.en: My father passed it down to me when I went on my first deer hunt.
translation.zh: 我第一次猎到鹿时他把这把枪给了我

translation.en: Today, I'm giving it to you.
translation.zh: 今天我把它给你

translation.en: I'm passing down this lever-action rifle to you,
translation.zh: 在我把这把杠杆作用的来复枪给你的同时

translation.en: -as I'm passing down the whitetail legacy. -Boom!
translation.zh: 也把打猎白尾鹿传承给你

translation.en: So now I got two guns.
translation.zh: 我现在有两把枪了

translation.en: Jaden, please, I'm trying to share something with you, son.
translation.zh: 杰登 等下再玩我正跟你说话呢 儿子

translation.en: My bad. Continue.
translation.zh: 对不起 你继续说吧

translation.en: This rifle symbolizes the bond of family.
translation.zh: 这把来复枪象征着家人间的羁绊

translation.en: Fathers teaching their sons to hunt is a rite of passage as old as time.
translation.zh: 父亲教儿子打猎是项历史悠久的传承仪式

translation.en: With this rifle comes great responsibility.
translation.zh: 这把来复枪代表着重大的责任

translation.en: And what we're doing out here is learning to be a man.
translation.zh: 我们现在是在学做人

translation.en: When you see your first whitetail deer, it'll look cute and fluffy,
translation.zh: 当你看到你要猎的第一只白尾鹿时你会觉得它很可爱、毛茸茸的

translation.en: but you can't get into those feelings.
translation.zh: 但不能被这些感情所左右

translation.en: We can honor the deer, but we can't love it.
translation.zh: 可以尊重鹿 但不能爱上它们

translation.en: I'll honor the deer by splitting his dang eyebrows.
translation.zh: 我会用一枪正中眉心来表示这种尊重

translation.en: -Can I offer one criticism here? -Well, sure, son.
translation.zh: -我能提点意见吗？-当然可以 儿子

translation.en: The one thing that Greg's gun has over this one is a laser sight.
translation.zh: 比起这把枪格雷格那把有激光瞄准镜

translation.en: That's the one thing.
translation.zh: 我要说的就是这一点

translation.en: Is it possible to take off the laser sight from Greg's gun
translation.zh: 有可能把格雷格枪上的激光瞄准镜拿下来

translation.en: and screw it on this old gun?
translation.zh: 装到这把旧枪吗？

translation.en: Or just think of this one as a backup?
translation.zh: 或者把这把当作备用的？

translation.en: Let's cut, Don. I think we got that.
translation.zh: 停吧 唐我觉得刚才那个镜头已经拍下来了

translation.en: [whispering] Jaden. Jaden.
translation.zh: 杰登

translation.en: Put those away and help me look for this deer.
translation.zh: 把耳机收起来 帮我找鹿

translation.en: Let me finish this track. This is my favorite song.
translation.zh: 让我听完这首歌 是我最喜欢的

translation.en: -Now. -[sighs] Fine.
translation.zh: -马上-好吧

translation.en: I'm hungry. You know what I could go for? Turkey panini. Paninis are good.
translation.zh: 我饿了 知道我想吃什么吗？火鸡铁板三明治 那个很好吃

translation.en: We've been out here 20 minutes. Have patience.
translation.zh: 我们已经在这儿待了20分钟了有点耐心

translation.en: I am patient. But I'm starting to get hungry.
translation.zh: 我很耐心 但我开始觉得饿了

translation.en: [sighs] I haven't even got to shoot my gun.
translation.zh: 我甚至连枪都还没开过

translation.en: I thought we'd be straight killing stuff the whole time.
translation.zh: 我之前还以为只管开枪就行了

translation.en: -This is boring. -Okay.
translation.zh: -真无聊-好吧

translation.en: We are gonna shoot the guns.
translation.zh: 我们会开枪的

translation.en: Hunting's about more than just killing. It's about patience.
translation.zh: 打猎不只是开枪射杀 而是要有耐心

translation.en: Can I call Caroline and tell her that I can't call her?
translation.zh: 我能给卡洛琳打电话告诉她我不能给她打电话了吗？

translation.en: So she won't worry.
translation.zh: 这样她就不会担心了

translation.en: No. Caroline will be fine. Focus on the deer.
translation.zh: 不行 卡洛琳不会有事的 专心猎鹿

translation.en: [loudly] What deer?
translation.zh: 什么鹿？

translation.en: -[whispering] Whitetail. Jaden, whitetail. -Where?
translation.zh: -白尾鹿 杰登-在哪儿？

translation.en: Across that field there.
translation.zh: 那边那块地上

translation.en: [Jaden] I see it.
translation.zh: 我看到了

translation.en: -This is awesome. -Go get your rifle.
translation.zh: -太棒了-去把你的来复枪拿来

translation.en: Do you see that? Amazing.
translation.zh: 你看到了吗？漂亮

translation.en: That is a nice first deer.
translation.zh: 第一次打猎就猎到这只可真是太好了

translation.en: -What are you doing with that thing? -Fixing to shoot this dang deer.
translation.zh: -你拿那把枪干什么？-瞄准打这只该死的鹿

translation.en: Put down Greg's gun and get your grandfather's rifle!
translation.zh: 把格雷格的枪放下去拿你爷爷那把枪！

translation.en: Fine. Dang.
translation.zh: 好吧 该死

translation.en: Right there.
translation.zh: 在那儿

translation.en: Should I go ahead and punch the time card?
translation.zh: 我该扣扳机开枪吗？

translation.en: No, not yet. Just keep him in your sights.
translation.zh: 不 还没到时候别让它离开你的视线就好

translation.en: I will.
translation.zh: 我会的

translation.en: [whispering] There it is.
translation.zh: 它过来了

translation.en: [Jaden] Drop him now?
translation.zh: 要开枪吗？

translation.en: No, not yet. Wait until he stops.
translation.zh: 不 还不能开枪 等它停下来

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是 长官

translation.en: Oh, my God! I can't believe this moment is here.
translation.zh: 天啊！真不敢相信这一刻到来了

translation.en: Take the shot.
translation.zh: 开枪吧

translation.en: What the hell is that?
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: Caroline.
translation.zh: 卡洛琳

translation.en: Because you were supposed to call me back! Nothing. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 因为应该是你给我回电话的！没什么 你在干什么呢？

translation.en: Swimming? That's cool.
translation.zh: 游泳吗？酷

translation.en: I'll ask my dad if I can come over later.
translation.zh: 我问问我爸晚点儿能不能过来

translation.en: Actually, no, I'm not.
translation.zh: 其实我没有

translation.en: It's just weird.
translation.zh: 这样怪怪的

translation.en: If you don't like him, why would you wanna go?
translation.zh: 如果你不喜欢他 干吗还要去？

translation.en: That's what I don't get.
translation.zh: 我不明白

translation.en: But y'all ain't even friends. I just think it's peculiar.
translation.zh: 但你们甚至连朋友都不是我就是觉得这样挺怪的

translation.en: I know why it's peculiar! I'm the one who taught you that!
translation.zh: 我知道这为什么很奇怪！这可是我教你的！

translation.en: I'm afraid to say it, but I'm worried about Jaden.
translation.zh: 我怕说这话 但我担心杰登

translation.en: I feel like right before the divorce,
translation.zh: 我现在的感觉就像离婚前那会儿一样

translation.en: like something bad has happened and there's no way of stopping it.
translation.zh: 感觉要发生不好的事却没办法去阻止它

translation.en: Oh, no, no. Come on, now.
translation.zh: 不 得了

translation.en: He's just got himself a little girlfriend. That's all.
translation.zh: 他只是有女朋友了 仅此而已

translation.en: I know. But we're talking about Jaden's future here.
translation.zh: 我知道 可我们说的是杰登的未来

translation.en: He's 12 years old. Getting older every day.
translation.zh: 他现在12岁了 每天都在长大

translation.en: If he doesn't take to hunting now, he may never.
translation.zh: 现在不学打猎 也许他就不会再学了

translation.en: Oh, hey, now. Come on.
translation.zh: 嘿 得了吧

translation.en: It's still very early on the trip. We got a few days now, huh?
translation.zh: 这次打猎才刚开始后面还有好几天呢

translation.en: He ain't doing too bad. Don't worry.
translation.zh: 他还不赖 不用担心

translation.en: [Jaden] You think he has bigger muscles than me? Seriously?
translation.zh: 你觉得他比我强壮？真的假的？

translation.en: Have you seen me lately?
translation.zh: 你最近见过我吗？

translation.en: -I love you, too. -At least he's thinking about pussy.
translation.zh: -我也爱你-至少他现在对女孩儿感兴趣了

translation.en: Call me in five minutes.
translation.zh: 五分钟后再打给我

translation.en: -Tell me you got that. -Oh, I got it.
translation.zh: -告诉我你拍下来了-拍下来了

translation.en: Jumping Joseph! You see the size of that thing?
translation.zh: 好大一只鹿！看看它的个头！

translation.en: -[Don laughs] It's huge. -Oh, my God!
translation.zh: -好大-哦 我的天啊！

translation.en: I've never seen anything like it.
translation.zh: 我从没见过那么大的鹿

translation.en: Look at that drop tine. That's gotta be at least 20 points.
translation.zh: 看啊 至少有20个角尖

translation.en: -How old do you think it is? -At least five years old.
translation.zh: -你觉得它多大了？-至少五岁

translation.en: That's what I call a non-typical.
translation.zh: 这才是我说的非同寻常

translation.en: God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: That was pretty cool. That deer looked crazy.
translation.zh: 太棒了 那只鹿太棒了

translation.en: I gotta say. I was having my doubts.
translation.zh: 我不得不说 我之前还有所怀疑

translation.en: This changes everything.
translation.zh: 这改变了一切

translation.en: -That non-typical is a sign from God. -Amen.
translation.zh: -那只鹿是来自上帝的旨意-阿门

translation.en: That deer is God saying that this trip is blessed.
translation.zh: 那只鹿预示着这次来打猎得到了上帝的保佑

translation.en: -Hallelujah. -That deer is our destiny,
translation.zh: -哈利路亚-那只鹿是我们的命运

translation.en: and it will take us to the promised land.
translation.zh: 而且它会带我们去到乐土

translation.en: We're gonna follow that trail upriver.
translation.zh: 我们要顺着那条路往河上游走

translation.en: Oh, my God, son...
translation.zh: 哦 天啊 儿子…

translation.en: If you could kill that deer... Oh, my Lord.
translation.zh: 要是你能猎到那只鹿…哦 天啊

translation.en: Should we start tracking it, Buck?
translation.zh: 我们要开始追踪它吗 布克？

translation.en: It's too late for ground-hunting tonight.
translation.zh: 现在天晚了 不适合打猎了

translation.en: We'll probably make camp right here on this sacred ground.
translation.zh: 我们今晚就在这片神佑之地宿营了

translation.en: [Don] Mmm-hmm. Yeah.
translation.zh: 我们今晚就在这片神佑之地宿营了 好的

translation.en: That's good, 'cause my underwear's riding up something serious.
translation.zh: 太好了 因为我的内衣现在让我感觉很不舒服

translation.en: -Oh, you got swamp ass. -Probably. It's wet as hell down there.
translation.zh: -你是易出汗体质-也许吧 难受死了

translation.en: Don, those hot beans are smelling delicious.
translation.zh: 唐 那些热乎乎的豆子闻着真香

translation.en: Jaden, you'll love these.
translation.zh: 杰登 你会喜欢的

translation.en: How do you make them spicy, again?
translation.zh: 我又要问了 辣味是怎么做出来的？

translation.en: -Piquante salsa. -Salsa.
translation.zh: -用了萨尔萨辣酱-萨尔萨辣酱

translation.en: Mixes hot salsa with the beans.
translation.zh: 把辣酱跟豆子搅拌到一起

translation.en: Your mouth will thank you, but your butthole will hate you.
translation.zh: 吃这个嘴上过瘾 屁眼儿遭罪

translation.en: -[chuckles] -This is a real ring-stinger.
translation.zh: 会火辣辣地疼

translation.en: There you go. Home sweet home.
translation.zh: 帐篷搭好了 这里就是温馨的家了

translation.en: Sleeping on the ground is gonna play hell on my back.
translation.zh: 我睡地上会背痛的

translation.en: Who's sleeping on the ground?
translation.zh: 谁会睡地上？

translation.en: -What is it? -It's an air mattress.
translation.zh: -那是什么？-充气床垫

translation.en: Mattress Masters gave it to me to try out.
translation.zh: 是商家送给我试用的

translation.en: Got king size. Inflatable box springs. Attachable bed skirt.
translation.zh: 超大双人尺寸的 弹簧床垫可拆卸式床围

translation.en: I guess that's better than nothing.
translation.zh: 有总比没有好

translation.en: I'd say it's a lot better than nothing.
translation.zh: 我会说要好得多

translation.en: Your back will think it's sleeping on a bed of feathers.
translation.zh: 你会觉得是躺在羽毛做成的床上

translation.en: You're pretty good at this outdoorsy stuff.
translation.zh: 你对野外的事倒是挺了解的

translation.en: I've been doing it my whole life.
translation.zh: 我一辈子都在野外活动

translation.en: Don't worry. You'll be good at it, too, one day.
translation.zh: 别担心 有天你也行的

translation.en: I guess. I've always considered myself more of a Marriott guy.
translation.zh: 也许吧 我觉得自己更喜欢住酒店

translation.en: By the way, I'm noticing a butt-ton of blood on your boots.
translation.zh: 还有 我注意到你靴子上有很多血迹

translation.en: It's good luck. It's what happens when you kill a deer.
translation.zh: 那是好运 猎到鹿就会这样

translation.en: -That's nasty. -[chuckles] Yeah. But it's tradition.
translation.zh: -好恶心-是的 但这是传统

translation.en: I remember my dad always had blood on his boots from hunting.
translation.zh: 我记得我爸打猎时靴子上总有血迹

translation.en: I used to look at them with envy.
translation.zh: 我以前总是很羡慕

translation.en: I had these clean Buster Brown boots.
translation.zh: 我以前有双干净的布斯特布朗靴子

translation.en: I couldn't wait to get blood on them.
translation.zh: 我迫不及待地想弄上血迹

translation.en: Then one day, when I killed my first deer, the first thing I did was run over there,
translation.zh: 到了我第一次猎到鹿的那天我做的第一件事就是赶紧跑过去

translation.en: I stuck my boots underneath, I sloshed all around.
translation.zh: 把靴子放到下面滚动

translation.en: Got them completely covered.
translation.zh: 让靴子表面完全沾上血

translation.en: I bet by the time this trip's over, you'll have blood all over your boots.
translation.zh: 我敢说等这次打猎结束时你的靴子也会的

translation.en: Nuh-uh. These are Timberlands.
translation.zh: 这双靴子可是添柏岚的

translation.en: [chuckles] You'll see.
translation.zh: 等着瞧吧

translation.en: I'll just turn this thing on now. There we go.
translation.zh: 打开气泵 行了

translation.en: [Buck] There we go. A bit for me.
translation.zh: 酒来了 这是给我的一口

translation.en: -There we go. Thank you. [chuckles] -A lot for Don.
translation.zh: -这是给你的 谢谢-唐要喝很多

translation.en: Little bit of whiskey for Jaden there. There you go.
translation.zh: 给杰登一小口威士忌 给

translation.en: All right. A toast. To past victories and future success.
translation.zh: 好了 祝辞致过去的胜利和以后的成功

translation.en: To fathers and sons. And to that big old non-typical!
translation.zh: 致父亲跟儿子致那只非同寻常的大鹿

translation.en: That burns more than scotch.
translation.zh: 比威士忌还呛

translation.en: When have you ever had scotch?
translation.zh: 你什么时候喝过威士忌了？

translation.en: Greg let me have a sip.
translation.zh: 格雷格让我啜了一小口

translation.en: Scotch.
translation.zh: 威士忌

translation.en: I like my whiskey American. Just like my cheese.
translation.zh: 我喜欢美国威士忌就像我喜欢美式奶酪一样

translation.en: In all my world travels, I've had Swiss cheese, French Brie cheese,
translation.zh: 周游世界时我吃过瑞士奶酪、法国布里干酪

translation.en: every kind of cheese you can name.
translation.zh: 你叫得出名来的我都吃过

translation.en: And I like processed American slices the best.
translation.zh: 我喜欢加工奶酪美式切片奶酪是最棒的

translation.en: Kraft cheese melts the best. That's why I like it.
translation.zh: 卡夫奶酪进嘴的融化感是最棒的所以我才喜欢

translation.en: I'm just not one who thinks it's better 'cause it's foreign.
translation.zh: 我可不是那种觉得外国月亮更圆的人

translation.en: -Could I have some more? -Look out.
translation.zh: -我能再喝点吗？-当心咯

translation.en: Jaden got himself a taste for the whiskey.
translation.zh: 杰登对于威士忌有自己的品位

translation.en: Just a little bit, though. Just a little.
translation.zh: 就一点点

translation.en: -You, too, Don? -Whoo-hoo!
translation.zh: 你也要吗 唐？

translation.en: [Don] He ain't gonna outdrink me.
translation.zh: 他喝不过我的

translation.en: All right. Here we go. One, two, three.
translation.zh: 行了 要喝了 一、二、三

translation.en: [singing] ♪ Emancipate yourself From mental slavery ♪
translation.zh: （波本威士忌）

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Damn. That was awesome. That was beautiful.
translation.zh: 妈呀 太棒了 真好听

translation.en: What'd you think?
translation.zh: 你觉得呢？

translation.en: It's good. I had trouble following the story of the song,
translation.zh: 挺好的 我不太懂那首歌写的什么

translation.en: but it was good. It was good. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 但挺好听的 好听

translation.en: -How long you been playing for? -Two years.
translation.zh: -你玩音乐多长时间了？-两年

translation.en: Two years. Wow, I had no idea.
translation.zh: 两年 我都不知道

translation.en: -[cell phone ringing] -Ah, hold up.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: -It's Caroline. Dang. Hold on. -[Don chuckles]
translation.zh: 是卡洛琳 该死 稍等

translation.en: -[Buck] Everything all right? -It's fine.
translation.zh: -没什么事吧？-没事

translation.en: [Buck] Tell me about this girl you're dating.
translation.zh: 跟我讲讲你这个女朋友

translation.en: -You go to the same school? -No. She's already in middle school.
translation.zh: -她跟你同校吗？-不是 她已经上中学了

translation.en: Oh, middle school. Uh-oh, look out. Jaden's got himself an older woman.
translation.zh: 中学 小心了杰登找了个比自己大的女孩儿

translation.en: No. Jaden got held back a year.
translation.zh: 没有 杰登留了一年级

translation.en: It's nothing to be ashamed of, right, son? It's all good.
translation.zh: 这没什么丢人的 对吗 儿子？没什么的

translation.en: Did I tell you I got a girlfriend?
translation.zh: 我跟你说过我有女朋友的事吗？

translation.en: Yes, I do. Her name's Kimberly.
translation.zh: 是的 她叫金伯莉

translation.en: I got a photograph of her here.
translation.zh: 这里有张她的照片

translation.en: There she is. Ninety-eight pounds.
translation.zh: 这个就是她了 体重不到90斤

translation.en: I call her my little spinner. Wanna know why?
translation.zh: 我叫她小陀螺 想知道原因吗？

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Because I set her up on the tip of my pecker
translation.zh: 因为我让她坐在我的老二上

translation.en: and spin her around like a spinning top.
translation.zh: 像陀螺一样转圈

translation.en: All right, Don. That's enough. [laughing]
translation.zh: 行了 唐 够了

translation.en: Oh, God, love her. [laughs]
translation.zh: 哦 天啊 我爱她

translation.en: After this trip, me and her are gonna visit her folks in Kentucky. Phew.
translation.zh: 这次打完猎后我们要去肯塔基见她父母

translation.en: They got it figured out. They got this beautiful land.
translation.zh: 她父母条件挺好的 有片好地

translation.en: Great big farm. All they do is sit around watching TV. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 有间大农场他们成天就只坐着看电视

translation.en: Don't they have a farm to run?
translation.zh: 农场不用经营的吗？

translation.en: I guess. I ain't never seen them do it, though.
translation.zh: 我想不用吧 反正我没见到他们忙活

translation.en: All I see them do is watch television.
translation.zh: 只见到他们看电视

translation.en: That is gangster.
translation.zh: 真棒

translation.en: Sounds kind of boring to me.
translation.zh: 我倒是觉得挺无聊的

translation.en: [chuckling] Me and Kimberly like it, so it's not that boring to me.
translation.zh: 我跟金伯莉喜欢 所以我不觉得无聊

translation.en: How about you, Dad? You got a girlfriend?
translation.zh: 你呢 老爸？你有女朋友吗？

translation.en: Who, Buck? The only tail your dad is chasing is whitetail.
translation.zh: 谁 布克吗？你老爸只对白尾鹿感兴趣

translation.en: [Buck chuckles] Yeah. That's right.
translation.zh: 是啊 说对了

translation.en: Maybe you should start dating again.
translation.zh: 也许你该再找个女朋友

translation.en: No, no, no. I'm all right as is. I'm doing just fine.
translation.zh: 不 我现在这样挺好

translation.en: Probably be good for you.
translation.zh: 可能对你有好处

translation.en: Seems like Mom is moving on. Her and Greg are talking about getting married.
translation.zh: 妈妈似乎已经翻篇了她跟格雷格在商量结婚的事

translation.en: They're talking about what?
translation.zh: 他们商量什么？

translation.en: He hasn't officially asked her yet, but she knows it's coming.
translation.zh: 他还没正式求婚 但老妈知道他会的

translation.en: They talk about it all the time.
translation.zh: 他们一直在说这件事

translation.en: Shoot. That's ridiculous.
translation.zh: 该死 不可理喻

translation.en: The ink on the divorce is barely even dry.
translation.zh: 她才离婚几天啊

translation.en: [chuckles] It has been two years, Buck.
translation.zh: 已经两年了 布克

translation.en: What are you, a human calendar?
translation.zh: 怎么 你是人体年历吗？

translation.en: Mr. Trapper Keeper? I know how long it's been.
translation.zh: 你把什么吃进肚里就变成什么吗？我知道自己离婚多久了

translation.en: God! Shoot. I hate selfish people!
translation.zh: 天啊！该死 我讨厌自私的人！

translation.en: [Jaden] I'll give it to him, though.
translation.zh: 但我会接受他的

translation.en: Greg told me some of his ideas for when he proposes.
translation.zh: 格雷格跟我说过他求婚的一些点子

translation.en: Man, that dude has a great imagination.
translation.zh: 天啊 他想象力可真丰富

translation.en: He was talking about all these crazy things like skydiving.
translation.zh: 他的那些点子就像跳伞一样难以置信

translation.en: Where you going?
translation.zh: 你去哪儿？

translation.en: I'm gonna go take a leak.
translation.zh: 去小便

translation.en: Dang.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: What were you thinking?
translation.zh: 你是怎么想的？

translation.en: You know better than to pull a stunt like this.
translation.zh: 你该知道这有多危险

translation.en: You could have hurt yourself.
translation.zh: 可能会把你自己弄伤的

translation.en: Sorry. Dang!
translation.zh: 对不起 该死！

translation.en: What is going on in your mind?
translation.zh: 你想什么呢？

translation.en: I just wanted to ride and y'all were asleep.
translation.zh: 我只想兜兜风 可你们俩都在睡觉

translation.en: You realize I have to pay for that four-wheeler now?
translation.zh: 你知道我得赔那辆车的钱吗？

translation.en: -You realize how much they cost? -[sighs]
translation.zh: 你知道那要多少钱吗？

translation.en: [Buck] Why are you recording?
translation.zh: 你拍这个干吗？

translation.en: This isn't part of the narrative.
translation.zh: 这个又不在拍摄范围内

translation.en: I figured it might make a good mid-point crisis--
translation.zh: 我想这是个很好的中点危机…

translation.en: Shut the camera off.
translation.zh: 关掉摄影机

translation.en: Trying to have a moment with my son. Remove yourself.
translation.zh: 我正教育儿子呢 你赶紧走

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
translation.zh: 是啊 好吧

translation.en: [sighs] This sucks. If you let me drive, then we wouldn't be in this predicament.
translation.zh: 这太逊了 要是之前你让我来开车就不会出这事了

translation.en: You shouldn't have taken out the four-wheeler without permission.
translation.zh: 你不该没问过大人就擅自骑四轮车

translation.en: Fine. I'm the devil. I'm a terrible person.
translation.zh: 好吧 怪我 我是个差劲的家伙

translation.en: -Who are you calling? -Nobody.
translation.zh: -你在给谁打电话？-不是打电话

translation.en: Dang, I'm making a video for my vlog.
translation.zh: 该死 我正给自己的视频博客拍视频

translation.en: What's up? This is Jaden running around here,
translation.zh: 大家好吗？我是杰登 我现在

translation.en: hunting in the woods with my dad.
translation.zh: 正跟我爸在树林里打猎

translation.en: Sucks.
translation.zh: 真逊

translation.en: Leave me some comments if you hate hunting, too.
translation.zh: 要是你也讨厌打猎就留下评论

translation.en: Give it.
translation.zh: 拿来

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你干什么？

translation.en: I told you one too many times to stay off the phone.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过很多次了 别玩手机

translation.en: But that's my private property.
translation.zh: 但那是我的私人物品

translation.en: I'm keeping this until the end of the trip.
translation.zh: 打猎结束前 这个由我保管

translation.en: For the next few days, you have to go without it.
translation.zh: 后面几天你不能用它了

translation.en: What about Caroline?
translation.zh: 那卡洛琳怎么办？

translation.en: The world isn't gonna end if you can't call your girlfriend for three days.
translation.zh: 三天不给你女朋友打电话又不至于世界末日

translation.en: But we're each other's support system.
translation.zh: 但我们彼此支撑着

translation.en: The cell phone is mine. Topic closed.
translation.zh: 手机现在归我保管 对话结束

translation.en: You're ruining my life and you don't even care.
translation.zh: 你这是在毁我的人生而你甚至都不在乎

translation.en: Maybe I'm ruining your life 'cause you're being a damn idiot.
translation.zh: 也许我是在毁你的人生因为你是个笨蛋

translation.en: Don't call me an idiot!
translation.zh: 别叫我笨蛋！

translation.en: -Okay. -Take it back.
translation.zh: -好吧-你收回刚才那句话

translation.en: I take it back. It's not like I meant it.
translation.zh: 我收回 我其实不是那个意思

translation.en: Let's forget about it.
translation.zh: 别纠结这个了

translation.en: Now what about that non-typical we saw yesterday?
translation.zh: 还是想想我们昨天看到的那只非同寻常的鹿吧？

translation.en: How'd you like to bag that son of a gun, huh?
translation.zh: 你觉得去猎那只鹿怎么样？

translation.en: Come on, we're hunting. Let's have fun.
translation.zh: 行了 我们在打猎呢 开心点

translation.en: I can't stand you sometimes.
translation.zh: 我有时候真受不了你

translation.en: [Buck] I see you peeking out from behind that tree.
translation.zh: 我看见你在树后面偷拍了

translation.en: This is not going in the cut.
translation.zh: 这段不会剪辑进去的

translation.en: After experiencing some technical difficulties
translation.zh: 在其中一辆四轮车

translation.en: with one of our four-wheelers,
translation.zh: 发生故障后

translation.en: we decided to go on foot.
translation.zh: 我们决定用走的

translation.en: Nothing was gonna keep Jaden and me from catching that monster non-typical.
translation.zh: 什么都阻止不了我跟杰登抓那只非同寻常的鹿

translation.en: When things don't go right, a true hunter straps on his boots and marches on.
translation.zh: 当事情不顺利时真正的猎手会选择勇往直前

translation.en: Just when we thought we'd lost the trail,
translation.zh: 就当我们以为跟丢了那只鹿时

translation.en: I noticed a whole mess of tracks by the river.
translation.zh: 我在河边发现了一团乱糟糟的动物脚印

translation.en: This was a good sign.
translation.zh: 这是个好预兆

translation.en: It looked like a well-traveled doe trail, and like every hunter knows,
translation.zh: 看起来像是一只忙碌母鹿的脚印而且所有猎人都知道

translation.en: where there's a doe, a buck is not far behind.
translation.zh: 雄鹿肯定就在离母鹿不远的地方

translation.en: I showed Jaden how the doe trail followed up the river.
translation.zh: 我给杰登讲了一下如何辨别脚印沿着河往河上游去了

translation.en: Our non-typical was leading us even deeper into the mountains,
translation.zh: 追踪这只非同寻常的鹿让我们往山里走得更深了

translation.en: miles away from human contact.
translation.zh: 距离有人迹的地方好几十公里远

translation.en: Almost as if it was calling us.
translation.zh: 就如同它在召唤我们一般

translation.en: Just like life, hunting comes with no guarantees.
translation.zh: 跟生活一样 打猎不一定有收获

translation.en: But I don't usually have a problem finding the big deer,
translation.zh: 但我一般都能追踪到大只的鹿

translation.en: especially with that old Sniper 2000 stuff I use.
translation.zh: 尤其是有狙击手2000的相助

translation.en: That's what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 我说的就是这个

translation.en: It's like he doesn't even care about catching this deer.
translation.zh: 感觉好像他甚至都不在乎抓不抓得到这只鹿

translation.en: This trip was supposed to be a way for us to bond.
translation.zh: 这次出来打猎本应是我们俩增进父子感情的机会

translation.en: Yeah, well, it doesn't look like that's happening.
translation.zh: 好吧 看来不太可能了

translation.en: -Jesus, Don. -What? I'm agreeing with you.
translation.zh: -天啊 唐-怎么了？我只是顺着你的话说

translation.en: It doesn't look like it's happening.
translation.zh: 那看来不太可能了

translation.en: -Yeah, well, stop. -Okay. Copy that.
translation.zh: -行了 别说了-好吧 知道了

translation.en: I was hoping to discuss something with you, if you don't mind.
translation.zh: 我希望跟你讨论点事情如果你不介意的话

translation.en: Yeah, what?
translation.zh: 什么事？

translation.en: Well, I was thinking maybe after this trip I go ahead and take a little time off.
translation.zh: 我在想也许等这次打猎结束后我再多休息一段时间

translation.en: What? Time off?
translation.zh: 什么？休息？

translation.en: Yeah, you know, I told you about Kimberly's parents' farm.
translation.zh: 对 我跟你说过金伯莉父母有间农场的事

translation.en: We were thinking maybe going up there,
translation.zh: 我们在考虑去那儿

translation.en: spend a little time, uh, hang out there. See how it fits us.
translation.zh: 待一阵子试试 看看适不适合我们

translation.en: But we got Washington next month.
translation.zh: 可我们下个月要去华盛顿

translation.en: That's the thing. I was thinking maybe you go up alone and I sit this one out.
translation.zh: 就是这个问题我在想这次你就自己去吧

translation.en: But we gotta shoot Buck Ferguson Takes On the Great Northwest.
translation.zh: 但我们要去拍《布克弗格森去到大西北》那集

translation.en: Well, Buck, to be honest,
translation.zh: 布克 说实话

translation.en: Kimberly's getting sick of me leaving all the time.
translation.zh: 金伯莉已经受够了我一直不在身边

translation.en: She's throwing around the "R" word.
translation.zh: 她提到了那个词

translation.en: What's that word?
translation.zh: 哪个词？

translation.en: Retirement. She thinks I should be retiring.
translation.zh: 退休 她觉得我该退休了

translation.en: I can't believe you're choosing now to bring this up.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信你居然现在提退休的事

translation.en: Don't you think I got enough to worry about with Jaden?
translation.zh: 你不觉得杰登就已经够让我烦心的了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, of course I do. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我当然知道

translation.en: Look, you and me have done things the world is gonna remember.
translation.zh: 听着 我们之前的成就已经很了不起了

translation.en: I've done them, but you videotaped me doing them.
translation.zh: 是我做的 但都是你拍的

translation.en: You wanna throw that all away?
translation.zh: 你要把那些都抛弃吗？

translation.en: No, Buck. I never said I want to throw them away. I...
translation.zh: 不 布克 我没说要抛弃那些 我…

translation.en: This isn't really that thought out of an idea.
translation.zh: 这并非什么深思熟虑的想法

translation.en: It was just something she was pushing on me.
translation.zh: 只是她在向我施压

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I can't allow it.
translation.zh: 抱歉 可我不同意

translation.en: Your dream of watching TV all day long is gonna have to wait.
translation.zh: 你成天坐着看电视的美梦要往后推了

translation.en: I need all hands on deck right now.
translation.zh: 我现在需要尽可能利用一切帮助

translation.en: Yeah. No. Of course you do.
translation.zh: 是啊 不 这是当然了

translation.en: We're in the middle of it, so, yeah.
translation.zh: 我们现在就正在拍呢 所以 是啊

translation.en: Maybe we can agree to discuss this at a later date.
translation.zh: 也许我们可以改天再谈这事

translation.en: -How about that? -Yeah. I don't know, Don.
translation.zh: -那样如何？-好吧 我不知道 唐

translation.en: Maybe in a year or so. But probably not.
translation.zh: 也许过一年再说吧但我可能还是不会同意的

translation.en: [chuckles] Sounds good. Just forget I even said anything about it.
translation.zh: 听起来不错 就当我什么都没说吧

translation.en: [Don] Hey, look what I found.
translation.zh: 嘿 看看我发现了什么

translation.en: Keep moving.
translation.zh: 继续走

translation.en: Be careful. You're gonna hurt yourself.
translation.zh: 当心 你会弄伤自己的

translation.en: I'm not. I'm trained for this. Greg set me up with parkour lessons.
translation.zh: 不会的 我接受过训练格雷格送我去上过跑酷课

translation.en: I thought you were taking karate. We agreed on karate.
translation.zh: 我还以为你学的是空手道我们说好学空手道的

translation.en: It was too hard, so I quit.
translation.zh: 太难了 所以我就不去了

translation.en: Well, it takes time to learn something, son.
translation.zh: 学东西是要花时间的 儿子

translation.en: You can't just go around quitting stuff 'cause it's hard.
translation.zh: 不能因为难就浅尝辄止

translation.en: [Jaden] That's not what Greg says.
translation.zh: 格雷格可不是这么说的

translation.en: Greg says if you don't like doing something,
translation.zh: 格雷格说要是不喜欢

translation.en: there ain't no reason to do it. And it's totally cool to quit.
translation.zh: 就不必去做 那样也没什么

translation.en: Well, that's a terrible lesson. No wonder you got held back.
translation.zh: 这话真是够离谱的 难怪你会留级

translation.en: Greg says it was the teacher's fault.
translation.zh: 格雷格说那是老师的错

translation.en: Greg's only telling you what you wanna hear
translation.zh: 格雷格只挑你愿意听的说

translation.en: because he wants to suck up and not hurt your feelings.
translation.zh: 因为他想拍你马屁而且还不伤害你的感情

translation.en: Trust me when I tell you that when you get a little older,
translation.zh: 相信我现在跟你说的话等你再大一些

translation.en: you won't think gymnastics are cool anymore.
translation.zh: 你就不会觉得练体操很酷了

translation.en: I told you, it's not gymnastics, it's parkour--
translation.zh: 我说过了这不是体操 是跑酷…

translation.en: Oh, you're okay.
translation.zh: 你没事

translation.en: No, I'm not. My leg's getting ready to seize up on me.
translation.zh: 不 我有事 我的腿这下要碍事了

translation.en: That's why I told you stop playing around on the rocks. Get up.
translation.zh: 所以我才叫你别在石头上蹦来蹦去的 起来

translation.en: Let me catch my breath for a second.
translation.zh: 让我喘口气

translation.en: -Is your leg hurting or are you tired? -Both. Dang.
translation.zh: -你是腿疼还是累了？-都有 该死

translation.en: Okay, we lost the whole morning already.
translation.zh: 行了 我们已经耽误了一上午了

translation.en: -Daylight's burning here. -But, Dad, my leg's fixing to die.
translation.zh: -现在可是大白天-可是 老爸 我的腿走不了路了

translation.en: [Don] Oh, you shit bird!
translation.zh: 该死的鸟！

translation.en: [Buck] You all right, Don?
translation.zh: 你没事吧 唐？

translation.en: [sighs] I slipped on this damn rock and hit my darn head.
translation.zh: 我在这块岩石上滑倒了 还撞伤了头

translation.en: Maybe it is a good time to stop for lunch.
translation.zh: 也许该停下吃午饭了

translation.en: Yeah, let's make camp. Sounds like a good idea.
translation.zh: 是啊 宿营吧 这似乎是个好主意

translation.en: Good, 'cause my blood sugar's running low.
translation.zh: 太好了 我现在血糖有点低

translation.en: Oh, shit, am I bleeding?
translation.zh: 妈呀 我的头在流血吗？

translation.en: Hey, Jaden, where's your daddy?
translation.zh: 嘿 杰登 你爸呢？

translation.en: -Making sandwiches. -You ain't hungry?
translation.zh: -在做三明治-你不饿吗？

translation.en: I am hungry. But I'm gonna put my hunger pangs into my music.
translation.zh: 饿 但音乐可以让我不去想自己饿了

translation.en: Oh, uh-oh. What's wrong?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I could tell you, but you would never understand.
translation.zh: 我可以跟你说 可你不会理解的

translation.en: Oh, you might be surprised what old Don understands.
translation.zh: 老唐的理解力可能会吓你一跳

translation.en: -[lighter clicks] -You smoke?
translation.zh: 你抽烟吗？

translation.en: Hell, yeah, I do. Don't tell your dad, though.
translation.zh: 是啊 但别告诉你爸

translation.en: Thinks it scares away the deer.
translation.zh: 他觉得抽烟会把鹿吓跑

translation.en: Can I get a toke?
translation.zh: 我能抽一口吗？

translation.en: There you go, Biggin.
translation.zh: 给 好好抽一口

translation.en: I wish my dad was more chill like you.
translation.zh: 真希望我爸也像你这么淡定

translation.en: Your dad is definitely not the easiest fella to get along with.
translation.zh: 你爸绝对不是容易相处的人

translation.en: He does put a lot of pressure on himself.
translation.zh: 他给了自己很大压力

translation.en: I think that's his drive to become the world's best hunter.
translation.zh: 我认为那正是他能成为世上最优秀的猎手的动力

translation.en: I can remember the first video I made with your dad.
translation.zh: 我还记得跟你老爸拍的第一支视频

translation.en: We were up in Michigan, and I was not prepared for the weather.
translation.zh: 我们当时在密歇根天气给我来了个措手不及

translation.en: That first day it had snowed ten inches and I'd forgotten my waterproof boots.
translation.zh: 第一天就下了25厘米的雪我却忘了带防水的靴子

translation.en: I turned to your dad and said,
translation.zh: 我跟你爸说

translation.en: "Please, Buck, let's turn back. Let's go home. Let's get out of here."
translation.zh: “拜托 布克 我们回去吧回家去 离开这里”

translation.en: But he wasn't hearing it.
translation.zh: 可他没听我的

translation.en: He sat me down. He was like,
translation.zh: 他让我坐下 他说

translation.en: "Don, do you know what kind of pressure I'm under? Do you?
translation.zh: “唐 知道我承受着怎样的压力吗？你知道吗？

translation.en: Every single person thinks
translation.zh: 所有人都觉得

translation.en: that Buck Ferguson gets his deer every single time,
translation.zh: 布克弗格森每次都能猎到鹿

translation.en: and I won't turn back until I do."
translation.zh: 所以猎不到鹿 我是不会回去的”

translation.en: -What'd you do? -What do you think I did?
translation.zh: -你怎么做的？-你觉得呢？

translation.en: Sucked it up.
translation.zh: 忍下来没回家

translation.en: We stayed out there for another three days and damn if your dad wasn't right.
translation.zh: 我们又在那儿待了三天不过你老爸说对了

translation.en: He caught himself a nice 12 pointer,
translation.zh: 他猎到了一只有12个角尖的鹿

translation.en: and we made one of the best videos we've ever made.
translation.zh: 我们也拍出了最棒的视频之一

translation.en: What about your feet?
translation.zh: 那你的脚呢？

translation.en: I lost my big toe to frostbite.
translation.zh: 我的一个大脚趾被冻掉了

translation.en: You lost a toe?
translation.zh: 你没了一只脚趾？

translation.en: Yes, I did. Yep.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Got a little bit of a balance issue because of it.
translation.zh: 因为这个我平衡性有点问题

translation.en: That's not really the takeaway.
translation.zh: 但这不是我要说的主题

translation.en: The point of the story is your dad is under a lot of pressure.
translation.zh: 我要说的是你老爸背负着很大压力

translation.en: You can understand being under pressure, right?
translation.zh: 这你能理解 对吗？

translation.en: I guess.
translation.zh: 我想能吧

translation.en: Don, why does my dad hate me?
translation.zh: 唐 我爸为什么讨厌我？

translation.en: Hate you?
translation.zh: 讨厌你？

translation.en: Oh, come on. You don't believe that.
translation.zh: 不是吧 你不会这么以为吧

translation.en: Your dad is tough to get along with, but he loves you.
translation.zh: 你老爸不好相处 可他爱你

translation.en: These last two years have just been tough on him.
translation.zh: 过去两年他过得挺苦的

translation.en: That divorce did a real number on his head.
translation.zh: 离婚的事对他打击很大

translation.en: I think he believes this trip is gonna somehow fix it.
translation.zh: 我想他觉得这次打猎会是次补偿

translation.en: Well, I wish he'd care less about me killing a deer
translation.zh: 我倒是希望他能少在意我猎鹿的事

translation.en: and more about giving me back my dang phone.
translation.zh: 多想想把手机还给我

translation.en: Caroline's probably worried sick.
translation.zh: 卡洛琳现在可能担心死了

translation.en: I can relate to that.
translation.zh: 这我能理解

translation.en: If I don't call Kimberly every now and then,
translation.zh: 如果不常给金伯莉打电话

translation.en: she definitely puts my ass in the damn doghouse. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我麻烦可就大了

translation.en: I wish there was some way I could let her know I'm okay.
translation.zh: 我希望有什么办法让她知道我没事

translation.en: That's all I want for her right now.
translation.zh: 我现在只希望能让她知道

translation.en: -You ready, buddy? -[Jaden] I'm ready.
translation.zh: -准备好了吗 伙计？-准备好了

translation.en: -Are you filming? Is it rolling? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你在拍吗 在录着吗？-是的

translation.en: Here we go. Hoverboard city.
translation.zh: 来吧 悬浮板之城

translation.en: -[Jaden] Don't be scared. -I ain't scared.
translation.zh: -别怕-我没怕

translation.en: Just don't wanna break my neck. Thanks for the ride, buddy!
translation.zh: 我只是不想摔断脖子 谢谢 老兄！

translation.en: Hey, Buck, what you doing? What you up to?
translation.zh: 嘿 布克 你在干什么？忙什么呢？

translation.en: Just looking for the shortest course to the top of this mountain.
translation.zh: 在找上到山顶的最短路线

translation.en: Oh, that's great.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Lunch is gonna get cold. Where's Jaden?
translation.zh: 午饭要凉掉了 杰登呢？

translation.en: Don, look at me. Where's my son?
translation.zh: 唐 看着我 我儿子呢？

translation.en: [clears throat] He's, uh, talking with his girlfriend.
translation.zh: 在跟他女朋友打电话

translation.en: No, he's not. I took his phone away.
translation.zh: 不可能 我收掉了他的手机

translation.en: I let him borrow mine. So he's...
translation.zh: 我把自己的借给他了 所以…

translation.en: -You did what? -I let him borrow my phone.
translation.zh: -什么？-我把自己的借给他了

translation.en: It was the right thing to do. He really wanted to speak with her.
translation.zh: 这么做是对的他真的很想给她打电话

translation.en: I took that away from him so he'd focus on this trip.
translation.zh: 我收了他的手机就是为了让他专心打猎

translation.en: How could you do that?
translation.zh: 你怎么能那么做呢？

translation.en: I guess I'm just a believer in true love.
translation.zh: 我想大概是我相信真爱吧

translation.en: He is really torn up about this girl and I didn't think it was right--
translation.zh: 他对这个女孩儿真的很上心而且我不觉得那是对的…

translation.en: Don! Stop it! I'm his father.
translation.zh: 唐！别说了！我才是他爸

translation.en: I know what's best for him, and I'd take it kindly
translation.zh: 我知道什么对他最好

translation.en: if you would not undercut my authority again.
translation.zh: 而且下次我教育儿子时拜托你别来拆我的台

translation.en: Copy that.
translation.zh: 知道了

translation.en: Nothing is going the way it's supposed to.
translation.zh: 没一件事顺利

translation.en: I cooked this nice meal.
translation.zh: 我做了丰盛的午饭

translation.en: The whole thing's gonna go to waste, just like this trip.
translation.zh: 都要白费了 就像这次出来打猎一样

translation.en: And now, I get to go be the bad guy again.
translation.zh: 现在 我又要当坏人了

translation.en: Thanks a lot, Don.
translation.zh: 多亏了你 唐

translation.en: Jaden!
translation.zh: 杰登！

translation.en: Jaden!
translation.zh: 杰登！

translation.en: What did I tell you, son?
translation.zh: 我之前是怎么跟你说的 儿子？

translation.en: No phone calls until after this trip and you disobeyed me.
translation.zh: 打猎结束前不能打电话你居然当成耳边风

translation.en: What do you have to say for yourself?
translation.zh: 你有什么要辩解的？

translation.en: What do you have to say for yourself?
translation.zh: 你有什么要辩解的？

translation.en: Caroline broke up with me.
translation.zh: 卡洛琳跟我分手了

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: 出什么事了？

translation.en: She went to this middle school dance,
translation.zh: 她去参加了中学里的舞会

translation.en: which everyone knows is a recipe for disaster.
translation.zh: 人人都知道参加了舞会肯定没好事

translation.en: Now she says she doesn't want to date someone in elementary school.
translation.zh: 现在她说不想跟一个小学生交往

translation.en: That's ridiculous. You two are the same age.
translation.zh: 荒唐 你们俩同岁

translation.en: That's what I told her.
translation.zh: 我也是这么跟她说的

translation.en: Well, are you doing okay?
translation.zh: 那你没事吧？

translation.en: I'm fine. She's the one being stupid.
translation.zh: 我没事 她才是犯蠢的那个

translation.en: She's being so dumb right now I can barely stand it.
translation.zh: 她现在笨到我都受不了了

translation.en: I hate being in elementary school.
translation.zh: 我讨厌上小学

translation.en: Look, Jaden...
translation.zh: 听着 杰登…

translation.en: I know you like this girl, but let me tell you something.
translation.zh: 我知道你喜欢这个女孩儿但我告诉你

translation.en: There is nothing wrong with you.
translation.zh: 你没什么问题

translation.en: If Caroline or whatever her name is
translation.zh: 如果卡洛琳或是那个谁

translation.en: can't appreciate you for who you are, then she does not deserve you.
translation.zh: 不欣赏真正的你 那她就配不上你

translation.en: Is that why you and Mom got a divorce?
translation.zh: 所以你才会跟妈妈离婚吗？

translation.en: Yeah. There were some other things.
translation.zh: 是的 还有些其他事

translation.en: It started in '09.
translation.zh: 这要从2009年说起

translation.en: DVD sales were down slightly.
translation.zh: DVD的销量有所下滑

translation.en: Your mom was proving through this whole thing
translation.zh: 正是这件事证明了

translation.en: to be a terribly selfish woman.
translation.zh: 你妈是个极其自私的女人

translation.en: She just had to give up her lavish lifestyle,
translation.zh: 她被迫放弃以前奢华的生活方式

translation.en: trips to the mall, that sort of thing, and then she just went crazy.
translation.zh: 停止疯狂购物之类的然后她就受不了了

translation.en: Just started acting out.
translation.zh: 就开始发脾气

translation.en: Around that time, Greg just kind of weaseled his way in
translation.zh: 就在那时 格雷格趁虚而入

translation.en: and basically stole my family out from me.
translation.zh: 偷走了我的家人

translation.en: It's funny hearing both sides.
translation.zh: 能听听当事双方的说法还挺有意思的

translation.en: Why? How do you mean?
translation.zh: 怎么说？什么意思？

translation.en: Mom said that you were always out hunting.
translation.zh: 老妈说你老出去打猎

translation.en: And when you weren't hunting, you'd sit around drinking.
translation.zh: 不打猎时就坐着喝酒

translation.en: Kinda checked out, like.
translation.zh: 好像她说的比较靠谱

translation.en: She said whenever she tried to discuss it,
translation.zh: 她说每当她要跟你说这件事

translation.en: you'd shut her down and leave her no choice but to leave.
translation.zh: 你都不肯跟她谈逼得她除了离开别无选择

translation.en: She said that?
translation.zh: 她是那么说的？

translation.en: She also said that it was the hardest thing she ever had to do.
translation.zh: 她还说离婚是最叫她痛苦的事

translation.en: You know why I love hunting?
translation.zh: 知道我为什么喜欢打猎吗？

translation.en: Because when you're out in these woods, there's nothing to disturb you.
translation.zh: 因为在树林里时 不会有任何烦扰

translation.en: Back home, the outside world has a way of just barging in on your life
translation.zh: 在家里时外面的世界会影响到你的生活

translation.en: and just screwing everything up.
translation.zh: 把一切都打乱掉

translation.en: It makes a man feel powerless.
translation.zh: 让人觉得力不从心

translation.en: But out here, all your cares just kind of melt away.
translation.zh: 但在野外 只要想着融入就行了

translation.en: When you find a deer,
translation.zh: 发现鹿

translation.en: and you bear down on that deer with your rifle,
translation.zh: 就用来复枪打倒它

translation.en: and you fulfill your rightful place in nature for one moment,
translation.zh: 那一刻你得到了内心的满足

translation.en: that power is restored.
translation.zh: 又恢复了那种力量

translation.en: Everything just falls into place.
translation.zh: 一切都解决了

translation.en: I could sure use that right about now.
translation.zh: 我现在正需要这样

translation.en: Oh, your time is coming, son.
translation.zh: 属于你的时刻就要来了 儿子

translation.en: When you take that monster buck we've been tracking,
translation.zh: 当你猎到我们正在追踪的那只巨鹿时

translation.en: everything will make sense, I promise.
translation.zh: 你就会理解这一切的 我保证

translation.en: I wish I didn't have to wait,
translation.zh: 但愿我不用等着

translation.en: 'cause I'm carrying a lot of stress, especially in my back.
translation.zh: 因为我背负着很大压力尤其是在我的背上

translation.en: Come with me, son. Grab that ax.
translation.zh: 跟我来 儿子 拿上那把斧头

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah!
translation.zh: 好耶！

translation.en: [Buck] Whoa! Look at this.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧这个

translation.en: [Buck] This rope bridge will save us time for sure.
translation.zh: 这条绳索桥肯定能给我们省点时间

translation.en: [Jaden] Whoa! Look down there.
translation.zh: 看看桥下面

translation.en: -[Buck] Here we go. -[Don] There you go.
translation.zh: -水流够湍急的-可不是嘛

translation.en: I'll go first to test it.
translation.zh: 我先过 试探一下

translation.en: Just make myself feel better.
translation.zh: 让我自己好受点

translation.en: -Long way down, Buck. [chuckles] -Yeah.
translation.zh: -加油 布克-好的

translation.en: [Don] We good?
translation.zh: 没问题吧？

translation.en: -You got me? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -拍到我了吗？-是的

translation.en: -I'm on the edge of frame? -Got you framed up.
translation.zh: -我在镜头里了吗？-你在镜头里呢

translation.en: [laughs] Look at that.
translation.zh: 看好了

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Whoo! Here we go.
translation.zh: 要开始咯

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -You all right? -You got it. Yeah.
translation.zh: -摄影机就绪了吧？-放心吧

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -Here we go. -[Don] Here we go.
translation.zh: -要开始咯-要开始咯

translation.en: You know what I'm thinking, Don?
translation.zh: 知道我在想什么吗 唐？

translation.en: You should cover this stuff from the other side of the bridge.
translation.zh: 你应该站到桥那边拍

translation.en: It's hard to see my face shooting from here.
translation.zh: 从这里很难拍到我的脸

translation.en: -Uh, how am I supposed to get-- -No.
translation.zh: -我要怎么…-不

translation.en: You know what I'm talking about?
translation.zh: 你明白我在说什么吗？

translation.en: Capturing the emotion on my face better?
translation.zh: 抓拍我的面部表情？

translation.en: Yeah, no, I understand.
translation.zh: 对 不 我明白

translation.en: -You want me to cross the bridge first... -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你想让我先过桥…-是的

translation.en: ...so I get coverage of you testing out the bridge before anybody crosses it,
translation.zh: …这样我就可以拍下你在其他人之前先试探过桥

translation.en: -because it's unsafe. -Exactly.
translation.zh: -因为桥不安全-就是这样

translation.en: Be able to cover my face better.
translation.zh: 能更好地拍到我的脸

translation.en: I do think a zoom would also be nice, though--
translation.zh: 虽然我觉得拉近镜头也不错…

translation.en: The zoom would be great from the other side of the bridge.
translation.zh: 从桥另一边拉近镜头效果会非常好的

translation.en: To do that but also to follow the push, your back, see you hit the other side.
translation.zh: 这么做的同时还要在你身后拍你过桥

translation.en: From the other side, though, it would be more the narrative simplicity.
translation.zh: 但从桥的另一边拍效果比单纯叙述要更好

translation.en: Zoom on me. You bring me in. We sell a lot of videos.
translation.zh: 镜头拉近给我特写 把我拍进去视频就能大卖

translation.en: Yeah. Hey, number one.
translation.zh: 是的 嘿 你最棒

translation.en: We're going for the best shots. Best video we've ever made.
translation.zh: 最棒的镜头 我们要拍出最棒的我们拍过的最棒的视频

translation.en: -Here we go. -All right.
translation.zh: -开始吧-好吧

translation.en: Lights, camera, action. [laughs]
translation.zh: 灯光、摄像机、动作

translation.en: [Buck] Here you go.
translation.zh: 你过桥吧

translation.en: -Jesus Christ. -[Buck] You good? You ready?
translation.zh: -天啊-行了吗？你准备好了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, I'm good. -Good.
translation.zh: -我好了-很好

translation.en: -It's a long way down. -It is.
translation.zh: -距离可挺远的-确实

translation.en: [Buck] It's gonna look great.
translation.zh: 肯定会拍得很棒的

translation.en: Come on, buddy. There you go. There you go!
translation.zh: 来吧 老兄 很好！

translation.en: All right. All right.
translation.zh: 行了

translation.en: Holy shit.
translation.zh: 妈呀

translation.en: -It's a long way down. Watch your step. -It is.
translation.zh: -距离挺远的 当心脚下-是够远的

translation.en: You're looking good. You're doing all right.
translation.zh: 不错 做得很好

translation.en: -Okay. -Doing good, Don.
translation.zh: -好的-干得好 唐

translation.en: [Don] Okay. Got it.
translation.zh: 好的 知道了

translation.en: Oh, God damn it.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: You look so funny. You're cracking us up.
translation.zh: 你这样挺搞笑的 让我们发笑

translation.en: Let's see how you look when you get out here.
translation.zh: 等你过的时候看你什么德性

translation.en: [Buck] Doing good, buddy. You're doing good.
translation.zh: 干得好 老兄 你干得挺好的

translation.en: -Don, you got this. -[Don] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -唐 你行的-哦 我的天啊

translation.en: Holy shit. Oh!
translation.zh: 妈呀

translation.en: Shakier than a damn Studebaker.
translation.zh: 这比斯图贝克博物馆还摇摇欲坠

translation.en: -Steady. -[Buck] You loving this, right?
translation.zh: -稳住-你挺喜欢的 是吗？

translation.en: Buck, you're gonna have a blast out here, you son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 布克 你玩得还挺爽的嘛 混球

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: -[laughing] -[Buck] You're all right.
translation.zh: 你没事的

translation.en: -Okay, okay. -[Buck] You got it, buddy.
translation.zh: -好的-干得好 老兄

translation.en: [Don] Oh, Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -Oh, my Jesus H. -He's moving good.
translation.zh: -我的天啊-他的动作很棒

translation.en: -Oh, he made it! There we go. -[Jaden] Whoo! Yeah!
translation.zh: -他成功了！好极了-耶！

translation.en: -Good job. -Good job, Don.
translation.zh: -干得好-干得好 唐

translation.en: He did a good job. He focused.
translation.zh: 他干得很出色 很专注

translation.en: I did it!
translation.zh: 我成功了！

translation.en: Nice job, Uncle Don. Nice job.
translation.zh: 干得好 唐叔叔

translation.en: I'm very grateful. You rolling?
translation.zh: 非常感激 你在拍吗？

translation.en: You were right!
translation.zh: 被你说对了！

translation.en: It is a pretty good angle. We're rolling.
translation.zh: 角度非常好 开拍吧

translation.en: All right, son. Wait here while I test the integrity of that rope bridge.
translation.zh: 行了 儿子 我去测试这座绳索桥时你就在这儿等着

translation.en: [grunts and exhales] Here we go.
translation.zh: 我要开始了

translation.en: [Don] All right, buddy, here we go.
translation.zh: 行了 老兄 我来了

translation.en: Whoa! It's a long way down.
translation.zh: 距离可够远的

translation.en: -[Jaden] It'll be all right! You got this! -[Don] Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -加油 老爸！你能行的！-是的

translation.en: Looking good. Slow and steady, Buck.
translation.zh: 很好 慢慢来 稳住 布克

translation.en: Oh, that's a long way down.
translation.zh: 真够远的

translation.en: Good thing no one else has crossed that one before.
translation.zh: 之前没人走过这座桥是件好事

translation.en: [Don] Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Oh, this is exhilarating!
translation.zh: 真令人振奋！

translation.en: Show off.
translation.zh: 臭显摆

translation.en: [Buck] I'm coming for you, non-typical!
translation.zh: 我要来猎你了 非同寻常的鹿！

translation.en: -Success! -Here you are.
translation.zh: -成功！-是的

translation.en: That was awesome.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: What's he doing?
translation.zh: 他在干什么呢？

translation.en: Check it out. Zip line!
translation.zh: 看好了 滑索！

translation.en: Jaden Ferguson, put that belt back on right now and cross it normal.
translation.zh: 杰登弗格森 立刻把带子系回去用正常的方法过桥

translation.en: That is a direct order. Over.
translation.zh: 这是命令 完毕

translation.en: This is gonna be a rush.
translation.zh: 这样一下就过去了

translation.en: Jaden, no!
translation.zh: 杰登 不！

translation.en: No, no, no!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Come on. Keep going. Keep going.
translation.zh: 加油 继续滑

translation.en: Come on. Come on. Come on.
translation.zh: 加油

translation.en: -Help! -God dang it.
translation.zh: -救我！-该死

translation.en: -Oh, Jesus. -Dad! Help me!
translation.zh: -天啊-爸爸！救我！

translation.en: Hold on, son! Don't let go!
translation.zh: 坚持住 儿子！别松手！

translation.en: -Help! -[Buck] I'm coming!
translation.zh: -救命啊！-我来了！

translation.en: [Jaden] Dad! Help!
translation.zh: 爸爸！救命！

translation.en: Hold on! Hold on, Jaden.
translation.zh: 坚持住 杰登

translation.en: -[Jaden] I'm slipping! -I'm coming!
translation.zh: -我在往下滑！-我来了！

translation.en: -Please, Dad! -Hold on.
translation.zh: -救我 爸爸！-坚持住

translation.en: Please help!
translation.zh: 救救我！

translation.en: -Dad, I'm slipping! -Hold on!
translation.zh: -爸爸 我在往下滑！-坚持住！

translation.en: -I'm slipping! -Son, hold on tight!
translation.zh: -我在往下滑！-儿子 抓紧咯！

translation.en: -Hold on! -Hold on, Jaden!
translation.zh: -坚持住！-坚持住 杰登！

translation.en: -[screaming] -No! No! No! Don't let go!
translation.zh: 别往下看！别松手！

translation.en: Almost there.
translation.zh: 我就到了

translation.en: -Help! Hurry! -Almost there!
translation.zh: -救命！救我！-坚持住！

translation.en: Oh, shit!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: -[Jaden panting] -I got you, son. I got you.
translation.zh: 我抓住你了 儿子

translation.en: I'm just glad you're safe.
translation.zh: 你没事我就很高兴了

translation.en: Do you know how much you mean to me?
translation.zh: 知道你对我来说有多重要吗？

translation.en: I'm not even mad that you did something so dumb and so stupid.
translation.zh: 你干了这种蠢事 我甚至都没生气

translation.en: Thanks, Dad.
translation.zh: 谢谢 爸爸

translation.en: Plus, you gotta admit, it's pretty nice just to chill here for a little bit.
translation.zh: 还有 不得不说 出来打猎还挺好的

translation.en: Are you still reading this article?
translation.zh: 你还在读这篇文章吗？

translation.en: -No. -No.
translation.zh: -没有-没有

translation.en: -But I was still looking at the pictures. -Oh, sorry.
translation.zh: -但我还在看这些照片-对不起

translation.en: It's nice we got this time to talk.
translation.zh: 有时间让我们好好谈谈真心不错

translation.en: I want to tell you that I know you're going through a lot of stuff
translation.zh: 我想说的是我知道你现在挺烦乱的

translation.en: and dealing with the divorce.
translation.zh: 还要面对我跟你妈离婚的事

translation.en: And now Greg's moved in and he's talking about marrying your mom.
translation.zh: 而且现在格雷格搬了进来还要娶你妈妈

translation.en: It's gotta be feeling weird.
translation.zh: 感觉肯定挺奇怪的

translation.en: Yeah. Mom was saying the same thing.
translation.zh: 是的 妈妈也说了同样的话

translation.en: The other night, Mom and Greg sat me down at the table
translation.zh: 有天晚上 妈妈跟格雷格让我在桌子边坐下

translation.en: and said if they ever get married,
translation.zh: 并对我说如果他俩结婚了

translation.en: I might feel weird what to call Greg.
translation.zh: 我可能会不知道怎么称呼格雷格

translation.en: She said I can either choose to call him Greg
translation.zh: 妈妈说我可以叫他格雷格

translation.en: or I can choose to call him Dad.
translation.zh: 也可以叫他爸爸

translation.en: -Uh-huh. What'd you say? -I said I didn't want to do it.
translation.zh: -你怎么说的？-我说我不想叫他爸爸

translation.en: -I thought it was strange. -It's very strange.
translation.zh: -我觉得很奇怪-是非常奇怪

translation.en: -Good for you, son. -Then you know what?
translation.zh: -干得好 儿子-可你知道吗？

translation.en: I tried it and it wasn't that bad.
translation.zh: 我试了下 没那么糟

translation.en: What? You called Greg "Dad"?
translation.zh: 什么？你管格雷格叫“爸爸”了？

translation.en: Yeah, but only, like, five times.
translation.zh: 是的 但只叫了五次

translation.en: I figured that if they ever get married, I might just switch back and forth.
translation.zh: 我想要是他俩结婚了我可能会犹豫不决

translation.en: How could you do that, Jaden?
translation.zh: 你怎么能那么做呢 杰登？

translation.en: What's the big deal? It doesn't mean anything.
translation.zh: 有什么的？又不代表什么

translation.en: Yes, it does, Jaden. It means a lot.
translation.zh: 不 杰登 这很重要

translation.en: Where are you going?
translation.zh: 你去哪儿？

translation.en: I'm gonna look for that deer.
translation.zh: 去找那只鹿

translation.en: -Where are you going? -Gonna go track that non-typical.
translation.zh: -你要去哪儿？-追踪那只非同寻常的鹿

translation.en: -You all right, buddy? -I'm fine.
translation.zh: -你没事吧 老兄？-我挺好的

translation.en: We don't find that non-typical, Jaden's never gonna shoot a deer,
translation.zh: 找不到那只非同寻常的鹿杰登就永远都不会猎到鹿了

translation.en: and this whole trip will be a bust.
translation.zh: 而且这次出来打猎就白费了

translation.en: You want me to come with?
translation.zh: 要我跟你一起去吗？

translation.en: No. You stay with Jaden. I want to be alone.
translation.zh: 不用 你陪着杰登 我想一个人待着

translation.en: Sure, Buck.
translation.zh: 好的 布克

translation.en: [Linda] Jaden? How you doing, sweetie?
translation.zh: 杰登？你怎么样 亲爱的？

translation.en: No, it's not Jaden. It's Buck.
translation.zh: 不 不是杰登 是布克

translation.en: Buck? I can barely hear you.
translation.zh: 布克？我听不太清楚你说话

translation.en: Is Jaden okay?
translation.zh: 杰登还好吧？

translation.en: Oh, Jaden's fine. Everybody's fine. That's not why I'm calling.
translation.zh: 杰登没事 大家都挺好的我打电话来不是为了说这个

translation.en: Buck, have you been drinking?
translation.zh: 布克 你喝酒了？

translation.en: A little. I'm not drunk.
translation.zh: 就喝了一点 我没醉

translation.en: We talked about you calling when you're drunk.
translation.zh: 我们之前说过关于你醉酒给我打电话的事

translation.en: That's not important. I got a bone to pick with you.
translation.zh: 这不重要 我有事要跟你说

translation.en: What's this I hear about you telling Jaden that he can call Greg "Dad," huh?
translation.zh: 我听说你让杰登叫格雷格“爸爸”这是怎么回事？

translation.en: Look, let me just say, that is never gonna happen, Linda.
translation.zh: 听着 我告诉你这永远都没可能 琳达

translation.en: We may not be a family, but I'm still the boy's father.
translation.zh: 我们也许不是一家人可我还是他爸爸

translation.en: I have a say in this,
translation.zh: 这件事上我有权利

translation.en: and there is no way I'm ever gonna let my son call another man "Dad."
translation.zh: 我绝不可能让我儿子管另一个男人叫“爸爸”

translation.en: Okay? Not now, not ever.
translation.zh: 听见了吗？现在不会 永远都不会

translation.en: -I have to go, Buck. -No, wait, Linda! Linda, wait.
translation.zh: -我要挂了 布克-不 等等 琳达！

translation.en: Linda...
translation.zh: 琳达…

translation.en: Are you really going to marry this guy?
translation.zh: 你真要跟这家伙结婚吗？

translation.en: -Huh? -I have to go, Buck.
translation.zh: 我要挂电话了 布克

translation.en: Linda? Hello?
translation.zh: 琳达？喂？

translation.en: Linda!
translation.zh: 琳达！

translation.en: Damn! Shit.
translation.zh: 妈的！

translation.en: [Jaden] I hate the new Camaro. It's ugly.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢新款的科迈罗 好难看

translation.en: I bet you get a lot of pretty girls wanting to get a ride in that, though.
translation.zh: 可我敢说肯定有很多漂亮姑娘愿意坐那辆车

translation.en: Girls don't know crap about cars.
translation.zh: 女人们根本不懂车

translation.en: My ex thought a Honda Accord was a good car.
translation.zh: 我前女友就觉得本田雅阁是好车

translation.en: My girlfriend knows more about cars than I do.
translation.zh: 我女朋友比我懂车

translation.en: She's a certified mechanic and a registered nurse.
translation.zh: 她有机修工证书 还是个护士

translation.en: -That's pretty cool. -It is cool.
translation.zh: -挺厉害的-是挺厉害

translation.en: First time I met her, she's like, "I'm a certified mechanic and registered nurse."
translation.zh: 我第一次见她时 她说“我有机修工证书 还是护士”

translation.en: I'm like, "Yeah? I got a busted truck and a heart condition."
translation.zh: 我说：“是吗？我有辆破车心脏还不好”

translation.en: Then she looks at me and she's like, "We're gonna get along just fine."
translation.zh: 然后她看着我说：“我们俩能处好”

translation.en: She's quick. She's a very funny woman.
translation.zh: 她反应很快、很风趣

translation.en: Have I showed you photos of Kimberly?
translation.zh: 我给你看过金伯莉的照片吗？

translation.en: You showed me some.
translation.zh: 你给我看过一些

translation.en: Bet I didn't show you that picture, huh?
translation.zh: 我敢说这张你没看过

translation.en: Look at that. These ain't the pictures I showed you. Look out.
translation.zh: 看啊 不是我以前给你看的那些有点心理准备

translation.en: [Jaden] Who are all these black dudes?
translation.zh: 这些黑人是谁？

translation.en: That's just her thing. She's just into black fellas. She's wild.
translation.zh: 她就喜欢这样 她喜欢黑人她这人挺狂野的

translation.en: Let me tell you what, look how many of 'em I got.
translation.zh: 告诉你吧 看看有多少这样的照片

translation.en: These guys are high-fiving each other. [laughs]
translation.zh: 这些家伙在互相击掌

translation.en: This guy is Phillip. He's our insurance adjuster.
translation.zh: 这人叫菲利普 是我们的保险精算师

translation.en: These were before y'all went out?
translation.zh: 这是你们俩在一起之前的事？

translation.en: Oh, no, sir, these are recent.
translation.zh: 不 先生 是最近拍的

translation.en: Yeah, no, I took these photos. Look at this one here. See?
translation.zh: 不 这些是我拍的 看这张 看？

translation.en: That's my foot in that photograph.
translation.zh: 照片里那只脚是我的

translation.en: -[Buck] What on God's green Earth? -Hey, Buck.
translation.zh: -你们俩干什么呢？-嘿 布克

translation.en: What are y'all looking at?
translation.zh: 你们俩在看什么呢？

translation.en: Uh, these, nothing, just the... These are the photos of Kimberly.
translation.zh: 这些 没什么 就是些…这些是金伯莉的照片

translation.en: [chuckles] You know the ones. You've seen them. Look out.
translation.zh: 你知道的 你以前看过 看

translation.en: I know what photos you're talking about.
translation.zh: 我知道你说的是什么照片

translation.en: -Leave, Don, right now! -Of course.
translation.zh: -出去 唐 立刻出去！-当然

translation.en: -Please and thank you. -All right. See you, Jaden.
translation.zh: -拜托 谢了-好的 回见 杰登

translation.en: You tell me what was happening, Jaden Ferguson.
translation.zh: 告诉我是怎么回事 杰登弗格森

translation.en: He was just showing me pictures of his girlfriend.
translation.zh: 他只是在给我看他女朋友的照片

translation.en: Those are adult images you have no business looking at.
translation.zh: 这些是你不该看的成人照片

translation.en: I thought you brought me on this trip because I'm mature now.
translation.zh: 我还以为你这次带我出来是因为我现在成熟了

translation.en: Why do you keep treating me like a dumbass kid?
translation.zh: 你干吗总当我是个孩子？

translation.en: 'Cause you are a kid when it comes to nudeness and sexual relationships!
translation.zh: 因为说到裸体和性关系的事你就是个孩子！

translation.en: He knows better than to show you that.
translation.zh: 他应该知道不该给你看那些照片的

translation.en: What's the big deal? Greg has worse pictures than that at home.
translation.zh: 有什么大不了的？格雷格有比那些更刺激的

translation.en: -Mellow out! -He...
translation.zh: -别紧张！-他…

translation.en: Oh, that dirty son of a bitch!
translation.zh: 那个臭流氓！

translation.en: Goddamn Greg. Goddamn Greg!
translation.zh: 该死的格雷格！

translation.en: Okay. Buck, that was on me, okay?
translation.zh: 好吧 布克 是我不好 行吗？

translation.en: Don't get mad at Jaden. We were talking about girls--
translation.zh: 别生杰登的气我们刚刚在讲女孩儿的事…

translation.en: I don't wanna hear it.
translation.zh: 我不想听

translation.en: Jaden doesn't need to be shown that junk. Okay?
translation.zh: 杰登不该看那种东西 好吗？

translation.en: -No discussion, case closed! -Okay, you're right.
translation.zh: -不说了 到此结束！-好吧 你是对的

translation.en: I don't want you to teach my son not to respect women.
translation.zh: 我不想让你教我儿子不尊重女性

translation.en: [chuckles] You've known me for 25 years. I respect women.
translation.zh: 你认识我25年了 我尊重女性

translation.en: You're the only person I know
translation.zh: 我认识的人里只有你

translation.en: that thinks letting his lady do an orgy is respectful.
translation.zh: 觉得让自己女人滥交是种尊重

translation.en: Buck, I was just trying to speak with him like a grown-up.
translation.zh: 布克 我只是把他看作是个成年人

translation.en: He's not a grown-up, Don! He's 12.
translation.zh: 他没成年 唐！他才12岁

translation.en: Even a grown person doesn't need to be exposed to your sexual peccadilloes.
translation.zh: 成年人也不必见识你那些性丑闻

translation.en: -My sexual what? -Peccadilloes!
translation.zh: -我的性什么？-丑闻！

translation.en: -Peccadilloes? [sighs] -Yeah.
translation.zh: -丑闻？-对

translation.en: What are you saying? I'm nasty?
translation.zh: 你什么意思？是说我下流吗？

translation.en: Okay, I guess I'm nasty. Fine, I guess.
translation.zh: 好吧 也许我下流

translation.en: Damn right. You think it's a normal thing to show people?
translation.zh: 太对了 你觉得给人看那个正常吗？

translation.en: Black guys pulling a train on your girlfriend?
translation.zh: 黑人轮着上你女朋友？

translation.en: What the F, Buck? You have crossed the line this time.
translation.zh: 搞什么 布克？你这次可过分了

translation.en: Oh, have I?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: You wanna know the real reason I'm retiring?
translation.zh: 想知道我到底为什么要退休吗？

translation.en: Oh, please, don't tell me about your stupid dream of watching TV.
translation.zh: 拜托 别说是为了坐在家里看电视

translation.en: No, it has nothing to do with television.
translation.zh: 不是 跟电视没关系

translation.en: The real reason is because you're an asshole,
translation.zh: 真正的原因是因为你是个混蛋

translation.en: and I'm sick of traipsing around these forests for nothing!
translation.zh: 而且我受够了成天在树林里瞎转悠却一无所获！

translation.en: To lose a goddamn big toe, that's all.
translation.zh: 除了没了一个大脚趾

translation.en: You don't care about anybody, you don't give a shit about me,
translation.zh: 你不关心任何人 不关心我

translation.en: and you never gave a shit about Jaden until his mom left you.
translation.zh: 而且离婚前你从来都没关心过杰登

translation.en: [scoffs] You can talk all the nonsense
translation.zh: 我跟金伯莉的事

translation.en: and Billy Bob bullshit you want about me and Kimberly's relationship,
translation.zh: 随便你怎么说都行

translation.en: but the bottom line is, at least I got somebody.
translation.zh: 但至少 我有伴侣

translation.en: At least I'm not alone in this world.
translation.zh: 至少在这个世界上我不孤独

translation.en: [groaning] Goddamn. Fuck.
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: You broke my nose.
translation.zh: 你把我的鼻子打断了

translation.en: You damned broke my nose and smashed it to the side of my face.
translation.zh: 你他妈的把我的鼻梁骨打断了还把它打歪了

translation.en: -Is it broken? -Get your hands off me! I'm done.
translation.zh: -断了？-别碰我！我不干了

translation.en: That's it. I'm sick and tired of the mistreatment,
translation.zh: 够了 我受够了逆来顺受

translation.en: disrespect and condescension. I'm not dealing with it anymore.
translation.zh: 得不到尊重和你的自以为是我受够了

translation.en: You know what? You can take this hunting video and stick it up inside your asshole.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 你自己拍打猎的视频吧还可以塞进你屁股里

translation.en: Good luck taking that gear out of here by yourself!
translation.zh: 但愿你自己能把这些设备都带回去！

translation.en: Twenty miles from the nearest road? Good luck.
translation.zh: 最近的公路离这儿30多公里？祝你好运了

translation.en: [Buck] Cars, cars and more cars.
translation.zh: 车、车、更多的车

translation.en: Crowds, pollution, global warming.
translation.zh: 人口爆炸、污染、全球变暖

translation.en: These are all things our modern civilization creates.
translation.zh: 都是伴随人类现代文明产生的

translation.en: Cities full of people caught up in the hustle and bustle of the rat race.
translation.zh: 城市里到处挤满了利欲熏心的人

translation.en: As you can probably tell, I'm not a big fan of city life.
translation.zh: 应该听得出来 我不太喜欢城市生活

translation.en: I much prefer the joy and solitude of good old Mother Nature.
translation.zh: 我更喜欢大自然

translation.en: Not that it would be all smiles and meditation.
translation.zh: 并不是说我这种生活就无忧无虑了

translation.en: Scaling this mountain is gonna take a lot of old-fashioned elbow grease.
translation.zh: 征服这座山要付出很多

translation.en: But I have faith that God is watching and he will reward our hard work.
translation.zh: 但我相信老天有眼他会让我们的付出得到回报的
