translation.en: And if it be his will,
translation.zh: 而且如果上帝在看着

translation.en: Jaden and I will find that old whitetail we've been looking for.
translation.zh: 杰登和我就会找到那只我们一直在找的壮年白尾鹿

translation.en: If my calculations are correct,
translation.zh: 如果我的计算正确

translation.en: our non-typical is on the other side of this hill.
translation.zh: 我们在找的那只鹿应该在这座山的另一边

translation.en: What if we get there and don't find anything?
translation.zh: 要是我们到了那儿什么都没找到呢？

translation.en: It will be there,
translation.zh: 它会在那里的

translation.en: but if we're gonna make it, we can't be negative.
translation.zh: 但如果我们要去 就不能消极

translation.en: It'll be a hard climb. You wanna get that deer,
translation.zh: 这山不好爬 想猎到那只鹿

translation.en: this is what we gotta do.
translation.zh: 我们就得爬上去

translation.en: I gotta say, this deer really isn't a top priority for me anymore.
translation.zh: 我要说这只鹿其实并不是我最在意的东西

translation.en: Basically, I'm good if we don't kill the deer.
translation.zh: 就算猎不到那只鹿对我来说也没什么

translation.en: Ain't like it's gonna affect my life in some significant way.
translation.zh: 对我的人生没什么太大影响

translation.en: Of course it will.
translation.zh: 当然会有

translation.en: The reason we're out here is so you can shoot a deer.
translation.zh: 我们来这儿就是为了让你猎鹿的

translation.en: How else are you gonna love hunting, huh?
translation.zh: 否则你怎么会喜欢上打猎？

translation.en: Oh, we're way past me loving hunting.
translation.zh: 为了让我喜欢打猎做到这份儿上也太过了

translation.en: Why don't you go up there and kill the deer,
translation.zh: 不如你上山去猎那只鹿

translation.en: -and I'll chill here? -You listen to me.
translation.zh: -我呢 就在这儿歇着？-听我说

translation.en: We are gonna finish this thing, okay?
translation.zh: 我们要有始有终 好吗？

translation.en: I don't care if I have to drag you up this mountain myself.
translation.zh: 就算要我把你拖上山 我也不在乎

translation.en: -Come on. -Please kill me now.
translation.zh: -走吧-快杀了我吧

translation.en: -Come on. Now. -Fine.
translation.zh: -快来 马上-好吧

translation.en: Jaden! Come on! Let's go!
translation.zh: 杰登！快点！我们走！

translation.en: [Buck] Beautiful!
translation.zh: 真美！

translation.en: Oh, Dad! Dad, look! Look.
translation.zh: 老爸！看啊！

translation.en: Jaden, get your rifle ready. Come on.
translation.zh: 杰登 准备好你的来复枪 快

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: [exhales] I'll get to finish this video after all.
translation.zh: 无论如何 我都要把这段视频拍完

translation.en: Don took the Sony, but this little deal is full 1080p,
translation.zh: 唐拿的是索尼摄像机但全是用高清画面拍的

translation.en: and will work in a pinch.
translation.zh: 关键时刻会派上用场的

translation.en: Oh, you look good in HD, Jaden.
translation.zh: 你在高清镜头里看着挺帅的 杰登

translation.en: My Lord, that is one gorgeous non-typical whitetail. [exhales deeply]
translation.zh: 我的天啊 真是只非同寻常的白尾鹿

translation.en: Right. This is the moment we've been waiting for, son. Are you ready?
translation.zh: 我们等的就是这一刻 儿子你准备好了吗？

translation.en: [Jaden] Oh, hell, yeah.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: Now, remember, control your breathing.
translation.zh: 现在 记住 调整好你的呼吸

translation.en: All right, when you're ready...
translation.zh: 行了 准备好了…

translation.en: take the shot.
translation.zh: 就开枪

translation.en: What's the matter? Is your gun jammed?
translation.zh: 怎么了？枪卡壳了吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna wait for it to turn around, get a cleaner shot that way.
translation.zh: 我要等它转过来来一枪更干净利落的

translation.en: Oh, no, don't wait. Take him now.
translation.zh: 不行 别等了 开枪

translation.en: I don't wanna injure him. Isn't that what you always say?
translation.zh: 我不想它受伤 你不是总这么说吗？

translation.en: Go ahead and injure him. He'll have plenty of time to bleed out
translation.zh: 开枪打它 它血流身亡前

translation.en: while we go down there and get him.
translation.zh: 我们有足够的时间走到它跟前

translation.en: Trust me. Just take the damn shot already.
translation.zh: 相信我 开枪就是了

translation.en: Okay, okay, relax.
translation.zh: 好吧 放松

translation.en: Take the shot. Take the shot.
translation.zh: 开枪啊

translation.en: What are you looking at me for? Look at the deer!
translation.zh: 你看我干什么？看那只鹿！

translation.en: Take the shot. Come on, there you go.
translation.zh: 开枪 好了 行了

translation.en: [loudly] Take the shot!
translation.zh: 开枪啊！

translation.en: Oh! No, he's running. Get him!
translation.zh: 不 它跑了 快开枪！

translation.en: He's running! Right over there! Get him! Shoot, Jaden!
translation.zh: 它朝那边跑了！开枪！开枪 杰登！

translation.en: Shit, it's Don! What the hell? You shot Don!
translation.zh: 该死 是唐！搞什么！你打中唐了！

translation.en: -[Don groaning] Oh, shit! -Oh, no.
translation.zh: -该死！-不

translation.en: -I gotta go out there and help him. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 我得过去救他

translation.en: Jaden, no! No!
translation.zh: 杰登 不！

translation.en: -[Don] Oh, I got popped in the leg. -Don?
translation.zh: -我的腿中枪了-唐？

translation.en: Oh, Buck. Buck, is that you?
translation.zh: 布克 是你吗？

translation.en: -I'm not doing good. -[Buck] I see you, buddy.
translation.zh: -不 我感觉不太好-我看见你了 老兄

translation.en: Hey, Jaden.
translation.zh: 嘿 杰登

translation.en: Here we are, Don.
translation.zh: 我们来了 唐

translation.en: Put your head up a little bit.
translation.zh: 把头往上抬点

translation.en: -Here we are, buddy. -Oh, it's bad. It's bad.
translation.zh: -有我们呢 老兄-情况不妙

translation.en: I'll make a tourniquet. Hang in there.
translation.zh: 我给你包扎止血 坚持一下

translation.en: You're a good shot, Jaden. You got me good.
translation.zh: 你这枪打得很准 杰登 正打中了我

translation.en: Hang in there. What the hell were you doing up here?
translation.zh: 坚持住 你怎么会在这儿？

translation.en: I couldn't leave till we finished that video.
translation.zh: 不把那段视频拍完我不能走

translation.en: Besides, who else knows which angles make you look younger?
translation.zh: 还有其他人知道从哪个角度拍能让你看着更年轻吗？

translation.en: Ow! That's too tight! Put your finger inside of it.
translation.zh: 太紧了！把你的手指放进去

translation.en: We gotta stop the bleeding so we can get you out of here.
translation.zh: 我们得把血止住好把你从这儿送出去

translation.en: Put your finger on to make the wound stop mashing.
translation.zh: 用你的手指防止伤口破裂

translation.en: [Buck] Hang in there.
translation.zh: 坚持住

translation.en: Don? Don. Come on, stay with me, Don.
translation.zh: 唐？唐 加油 清醒清醒 唐

translation.en: Stay with me. Come on, buddy.
translation.zh: 醒醒 加油 老兄

translation.en: Is he dead?
translation.zh: 他死了吗？

translation.en: Hey, Mom, you got that pretty dress on.
translation.zh: 嘿 老妈 你穿了那条漂亮的裙子

translation.en: We gotta get him out of here. Come on.
translation.zh: 我们得带他离开这里 来吧

translation.en: -Ready? Bring him up. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -准备好了吗？把他扶起来-好的

translation.en: [grunts] There you go.
translation.zh: 行了

translation.en: Don, ready? One, two, three.
translation.zh: 唐 准备好了吗？一、二、三

translation.en: [Buck] All right, come on.
translation.zh: 行了 加把劲儿

translation.en: [Don] Put me down. Put me down.
translation.zh: 把我放下

translation.en: -Put me down. -[Buck] All right. Get him down.
translation.zh: -把我放下-行了 把他放下

translation.en: Good night, my special son.
translation.zh: 晚安 我特别的儿子

translation.en: We're never gonna get Don out of these mountains.
translation.zh: 我们没可能把唐从这山里弄出去的

translation.en: Sorry, Dad. Sorry for shooting Don.
translation.zh: 对不起 老爸 抱歉是我开枪打中了唐

translation.en: Oh, Jaden, it's not your fault.
translation.zh: 杰登 这不是你的错

translation.en: Yes, it is. I can't do anything without messing it up.
translation.zh: 不 是我的错 我每件事都做不好

translation.en: I failed at hunting just like I failed at school.
translation.zh: 我打猎打不好就像我上学也上不好一样

translation.en: I don't need an extra year to grow and I'm not a visual learner.
translation.zh: 我不需要留级一年我也不是视觉学习者

translation.en: What you all talking about? I'm bleeding... bleeding out.
translation.zh: 你在说什么呢？我在流血呢…

translation.en: This just proves it.
translation.zh: 这件事就是个证明

translation.en: I'm just not smart.
translation.zh: 我不聪明

translation.en: I'm stupid, Dad.
translation.zh: 我很笨 老爸

translation.en: Don't you ever talk about yourself like that.
translation.zh: 不许这么说自己

translation.en: I don't ever wanna hear those words come out of your mouth again.
translation.zh: 我不想再听见你这么说自己

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是 长官

translation.en: Y'all just keep talking, I'm bleeding.
translation.zh: 我流血这会儿你们俩就只顾着讲话了

translation.en: [Buck] If there's anybody stupid here, it's me.
translation.zh: 如果说有谁是笨蛋 那就是我

translation.en: We should've turned back a long time ago.
translation.zh: 我们早就该回去了

translation.en: I wanted you to kill that non-typical so bad,
translation.zh: 我太想让你猎到那只非同寻常的鹿了

translation.en: I didn't care what I had to do.
translation.zh: 都不惜代价了

translation.en: I thought if you loved hunting,
translation.zh: 我以为要是你喜欢打猎

translation.en: it could be something we could do together,
translation.zh: 我们就能多在一起打打猎

translation.en: 'cause I'm not living with you anymore and I don't get to see you that much.
translation.zh: 因为我们俩已经不一块儿生活了没法常见到你

translation.en: I was just hoping there would be a way that...
translation.zh: 我只是希望这样…

translation.en: I could always be in your life.
translation.zh: 我就能常出现在你的生活里

translation.en: But you don't need a reason to be in my life.
translation.zh: 但你不需要什么理由

translation.en: You're my father.
translation.zh: 你是我爸

translation.en: What y'all doing over there? Having a sandwich?
translation.zh: 你们在那儿干什么呢？吃三明治吗？

translation.en: [Buck] I don't know what to do.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么做

translation.en: Can't carry him out of here. Need a helicopter or a damn stretcher.
translation.zh: 没法把他从这里背出去需要直升机或是担架

translation.en: How about an air mattress?
translation.zh: 用充气床垫呢？

translation.en: [chuckles] Jaden...
translation.zh: 杰登…

translation.en: You, son...
translation.zh: 你 儿子…

translation.en: are a damn genius.
translation.zh: 你是天才啊

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: -[Buck] Oh, there we go. -[Don] Buck.
translation.zh: -行了-布克

translation.en: [Buck] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: We got you.
translation.zh: 有我们在呢

translation.en: Gonna hop on there, we start downstream.
translation.zh: 跳上去 我们顺着河流飘漂下去

translation.en: It's gonna be rough as hell. Okay?
translation.zh: 肯定会很凶险 好吗？

translation.en: Hold on to him and stay on this mattress best you can.
translation.zh: 把住他 尽量别掉下去

translation.en: -You understand? -Don't worry, I got it.
translation.zh: -你明白了吗？-别担心 交给我吧

translation.en: You doing all right there, Don?
translation.zh: 你没什么问题吧 唐？

translation.en: Good enough. Ready, son?
translation.zh: 很好 准备好了吗 儿子？

translation.en: I was born ready.
translation.zh: 我生来就准备好了

translation.en: All right. Don't get wet.
translation.zh: 行了 别掉进水里

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走

translation.en: [Don] Oh, waterbed.
translation.zh: 水床

translation.en: Oh, hell, yeah.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: [Buck] Watch out. Paddle, paddle, paddle.
translation.zh: 当心 划桨

translation.en: These rapids aren't so bad, maybe class two.
translation.zh: 这些湍流还可以 也许算第二级的

translation.en: They're bad enough. Just be careful.
translation.zh: 已经够凶险的了 别掉以轻心

translation.en: I've seen bigger waves in a toilet bowl.
translation.zh: 马桶冲水都比这个浪大

translation.en: Jaden, Jaden, Jaden, hold on. Yeah!
translation.zh: 杰登 抓住 耶！

translation.en: -[Jaden] Yeah! -[Buck] Yeah!
There we go. Hold on to the rope. Hold on to the rope.
translation.zh: 行了 抓住绳子

translation.en: Now, these look like class three.
translation.zh: 这里的水流是第三级的

translation.en: [Buck] Whoo! Yeah!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: Making me faint.
translation.zh: 我有些晕

translation.en: What's happening?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: You ready? Well, come on, let's go.
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？来吧 划吧

translation.en: [Buck] Hold on to the rope!
translation.zh: 抓紧绳子！

translation.en: Doing good, son. Hold on tight!
translation.zh: 干得好 儿子 抓紧喽！

translation.en: Hold on for a little bit longer!
translation.zh: 再坚持一下！

translation.en: -Brutal! -Hold on!
translation.zh: -水流太猛了！-抓紧了！

translation.en: [Buck] We did good, son. We did good.
translation.zh: 我们做得很不错 儿子

translation.en: You're all right. You're all right.
translation.zh: 你没事

translation.en: -[Jaden] Are you okay, Don? -Yeah, I feel good.
translation.zh: -你还好吗 唐？-是的 我感觉还好

translation.en: I really appreciate this valiant effort to save me.
translation.zh: 我真的很感激你们这么英勇地救我

translation.en: Oh, this sounds like a biggie.
translation.zh: 这个听上去可不得了

translation.en: -All right, come on, paddle, paddle. -Let's just go to the shore.
translation.zh: -行了 加油 划桨-咱们上岸吧

translation.en: [Buck] We can do this, son. Here we go.
translation.zh: 我们能行的 儿子 来吧

translation.en: -Oh, my God, here's the big one! -Oh, Jesus.
translation.zh: -哦 天啊 大浪来了！-天啊

translation.en: [Buck] Here we go! Hang on, Jaden!
translation.zh: 冲吧！抓紧了 杰登！

translation.en: Hold on to the rope!
translation.zh: 抓住那根绳子！

translation.en: Hold on!
translation.zh: 坚持住！

translation.en: -My rifle! -[Buck] No, Jaden!
translation.zh: -我的枪！-不 杰登！

translation.en: Jaden, no!
translation.zh: 杰登 不！

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸爸！

translation.en: -Dad! -Jaden!
translation.zh: -爸爸！-杰登！

translation.en: -Dad! Dad! -Jaden!
translation.zh: -爸爸！-杰登！

translation.en: Hold on, son!
translation.zh: 坚持住 儿子！

translation.en: Grab my hand! Grab my hand!
translation.zh: 抓住我的手！

translation.en: I got you. Hold on. I got you.
translation.zh: 我抓住你了 坚持住

translation.en: [Jaden] But my rifle.
translation.zh: 可我的枪没捞到

translation.en: [Buck] Let it go, son. Let it go.
translation.zh: 别管枪了 儿子 别管它了

translation.en: Dad. I wanna play you a song I've been working on.
translation.zh: 爸爸 我最近在写一首歌想让你听听看

translation.en: I'd love to hear it. You wrote a song?
translation.zh: 我很想听 你写了首歌？

translation.en: It's not perfect. Here it goes.
translation.zh: 算不上完美 我要唱了

translation.en: ♪ In the mirror, in the mirror ♪
translation.zh: 在镜子里

translation.en: ♪ It's my face I see ♪
translation.zh: 我看到了自己的脸

translation.en: ♪ But it's my father's Yeah, my father's ♪
translation.zh: 但那是爸爸的脸

translation.en: ♪ Staring back at me ♪
translation.zh: 他在看着我

translation.en: Hold on. I'm gonna start over.
translation.zh: 等一下 对不起

translation.en: ♪ My father was a hunter ♪
translation.zh: 我爸爸是个猎人

translation.en: ♪ And I was his son ♪
translation.zh: 我是他儿子

translation.en: ♪ My father was a hunter ♪
translation.zh: 我爸爸是个猎人

translation.en: ♪ And I was his son ♪
translation.zh: 我是他儿子

translation.en: ♪ My father was a hunter ♪
translation.zh: 我爸爸是个猎人

translation.en: ♪ And I was his son ♪
translation.zh: 我是他儿子

translation.en: ♪ I was his son ♪
translation.zh: 我是他儿子

translation.en: Where are we?
translation.zh: 我们这是到哪儿了？

translation.en: You're almost out of here, buddy.
translation.zh: 你就快出山了 老兄

translation.en: -Hey, Buck. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -嘿 布克-怎么了？

translation.en: Thank you for saving my life.
translation.zh: 谢谢你救了我的命

translation.en: You'd do the same for me.
translation.zh: 你也会为我做同样的事的

translation.en: The only reason I was gonna retire
translation.zh: 我退休

translation.en: was because I thought you didn't care about me.
translation.zh: 只是因为我以为你不关心我了

translation.en: I guess if you saved my life, you do.
translation.zh: 我想既然你救了我就说明你还关心我

translation.en: I was wrong, Buck, when I said you were alone.
translation.zh: 之前说你孤独是我错了 布克

translation.en: You're not alone. You always got old Don.
translation.zh: 你不孤独 老唐会一直支持你的

translation.en: -I know I do, buddy. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 我知道 老兄

translation.en: All right, well, we only got one four-wheeler.
translation.zh: 行了 但我们只有一辆四轮车

translation.en: Well, what am I supposed to do?
translation.zh: 好吧 我该怎么办？

translation.en: Sit here all alone in the woods, totally bored?
translation.zh: 就一个人在树林里坐着发呆吗？

translation.en: No, sir. I want you to take this four-wheeler,
translation.zh: 不 小子 我想让你开这辆四轮车

translation.en: drive Don to Cherokee Mountain Outfitters and get him an ambulance,
translation.zh: 送唐去切洛基山户外用品店给他叫救护车

translation.en: -but under one condition. -What?
translation.zh: -但有个条件-什么？

translation.en: You have to drive fast as hell.
translation.zh: 你得尽量快开

translation.en: Good, 'cause that's how I do my best driving, anyway.
translation.zh: 很好 因为我就擅长开快车

translation.en: Don't forget to send someone back to get me.
translation.zh: 别忘了叫人回来接我

translation.en: I won't forget you.
translation.zh: 我不会忘的

translation.en: Bye, Dad.
translation.zh: 再见 老爸

translation.en: Bye, son.
translation.zh: 再见 儿子
